original_text: 青山村种的水稻产量逐年增长，2013年平均每公顷产7200kg，2015年平均每公顷产比2014年多792kg，求水稻每公顷产量的年平均增长率．
new_text: The rice yield in Qingshan Village has been increasing year by year. In 2013, the average yield per hectare was 7200kg. In 2015, the average yield per hectare was 792kg higher than in 2014. Calculate the annual average growth rate of rice yield per hectare.

original_text: 某校计划购买20张书柜和1批书架，现从A、B2家超市了解到：同型号的产品价格相同，书柜每张210元，书架每只70元；A超市的优惠政策为每买1张书柜赠送1只书架，B超市的优惠政策为所有商品0.8折；设该校购买x（x＞20）只书架．若规定只能到其中1个超市购买所有商品，当购买多少只书架时，无论到哪家超市所付货款都1样？
new_text: A school plans to purchase 20 bookcases and 1 batch of bookshelves. Currently, from supermarkets A and B2, it is understood that products of the same model have the same price. Each bookcase costs 210 yuan, and each bookshelf costs 70 yuan. Supermarket A offers a promotion of 1 free bookshelf for every purchase of 1 bookcase, while supermarket B offers a discount of 20% off all goods. Let's assume the school purchases x (x > 20) bookshelves. If it is required to purchase all the items from only one supermarket, how many bookshelves should be purchased so that the total payment is the same regardless of which supermarket is chosen?

original_text: 某地区2014年投入教育经费1000万元，至2016年3年总计投入教育经费3640万元，假设2014年至2016年该地区投入教育经费的平均增长率相同，求年平均增长率．
new_text: In a certain region, the education expenditure was 10 million yuan in 2014. From 2014 to 2016, a total of 36.4 million yuan was invested in education over the course of 3 years. Assuming that the average growth rate of education expenditure in this region from 2014 to 2016 is the same, we need to find the annual average growth rate.

original_text: 某礼品制造工厂接受1批玩具的订货任务，按计划天数生产，如果每天生产20个玩具，则比订货任务少100个；如果每天生产23个玩具，则可以超过订货任务20个．原计划几天完成任务？
new_text: A certain gift manufacturing factory received an order for 1 batch of toys. According to the planned number of days for production, if 20 toys are produced each day, there will be 100 fewer toys than the order. If 23 toys are produced each day, there will be 20 more toys than the order. How many days were originally planned to complete the task?

original_text: 我国水资源比较缺乏，人均水量约为世界人均水量的41分之，其中西北地区缺水尤为严重1村民为了蓄水，他把1块矩形白铁皮4个角各切去1个同样大小的小正方形后制作1个无盖水箱用于接雨水已知白铁皮的长为280cm，宽为160cm．若水箱的底面积为16000cm^2，请求出切去的小正方形边长．
new_text: Our country's water resources are relatively scarce, with per capita water volume being about 41% of the world average. The water shortage is particularly severe in the northwest region. In order to store water, a villager cut off a same-sized small square from each of the four corners of a rectangular white iron sheet and made an uncovered water tank for collecting rainwater. It is known that the length of the white iron sheet is 280cm and the width is 160cm. If the area of the tank's bottom is 16000cm^2, please calculate the length of the side of the small square that was cut off.

original_text: 为庆祝今年红军长征胜利80周年，某校1初（1）班举行了主题班会，有20名同学共做了52张纪念卡，其中女生每人做3张，男生每人做2张，女生有几人做纪念卡
new_text: To celebrate the 80th anniversary of the victory of the Red Army's Long March this year, Class 1 of a certain school held a themed class meeting. A total of 20 students made 52 commemorative cards, with each female student making 3 cards and each male student making 2 cards. How many female students made commemorative cards?

original_text: 某果园2012年水果产量为100吨，2014年水果产量为144吨，则该果园水果产量的年平均增长率为多少？
new_text:
The average annual growth rate of fruit production in a certain orchard can be calculated as follows: 

First, we need to find the total increase in fruit production over the given period. 

The increase in fruit production from 2012 to 2014 is 144 tons - 100 tons = 44 tons. 

Next, we need to calculate the number of years between 2012 and 2014, which is 2014 - 2012 = 2 years. 

Finally, we can calculate the average annual growth rate by dividing the total increase in fruit production by the number of years: 

Average annual growth rate = (44 tons / 2 years) = 22 tons/year. 

Therefore, the average annual growth rate of fruit production in the orchard is 22 tons per year.

original_text: 在国家“1带1路”发展战略等多种因素影响下，某企业的利润逐年提高，据统计，该企业2016年利润为3亿元，2018年利润为4.32亿元，若2019年保持前2年的年平均增长率不变，该企业2017、2018年的年平均增长率为多少？
new_text: Under the influence of various factors such as the national "Belt and Road" development strategy, the profit of a certain enterprise has been increasing year by year. According to statistics, the profit of the enterprise was 300 million yuan in 2016 and 432 million yuan in 2018. If the annual average growth rate of the previous two years is maintained in 2019, what is the annual average growth rate of the enterprise in 2017 and 2018?

original_text: 服装厂要生产1批某种型号的学生服，已知每3米布料可做上衣2件或裤子3条，计划用600米布料生产学生服，应该用多少米布料生产上衣恰好配套？
new_text: A clothing factory wants to produce a batch of a certain type of student uniform. It is known that 3 meters of fabric can be used to make either 2 tops or 3 pants. They plan to use 600 meters of fabric to produce the student uniforms. How many meters of fabric should be used to produce the exact number of tops?

original_text: 据某省商务厅最新消息，2018年第一季度该省企业对“1带1路”沿线国家的投资额为10亿美元，第三季度的投资额增加到了14.4亿美元．求该省2第、3季度投资额的平均增长率．
new_text: According to the latest news from the Provincial Department of Commerce, the investment amount of enterprises in the province in the first quarter of 2018 in countries along the "Belt and Road" reached 1 billion US dollars. The investment amount in the third quarter increased to 1.44 billion US dollars. Please calculate the average growth rate of investment in the second and third quarters of the province.

original_text: 宜兴科技公司生产销售1种电子产品，该产品总成本包括技术成本、制造成本、销售成本3部分，经核算，2013年该产品各部分成本所占比例约为2：7：1且2013年该产品的技术成本、制造成本分别为400万元、1400万元．为降低总成本，该公司2014年及2015年增加了技术成本投入，确保这2年技术成本都比前1年增加1个相同的100分数x(x<50%)，制造成本在这2年里都比前1年减少1个相同的100分数2x；同时为了扩大销售量，2015年的销售成本将在2013年的基础上提高10%，经过以上变革，预计2015年该产品总成本达到2013年该产品总成本的4/5，求x的值．
new_text:
Yixing Technology Company produces and sells one type of electronic product. The total cost of this product includes three parts: technology cost, manufacturing cost, and sales cost. According to calculations, in 2013, the proportions of these three cost components were approximately 2:7:1. The technology cost and manufacturing cost of this product in 2013 were 4 million yuan and 14 million yuan, respectively. 

In order to reduce the total cost, the company increased the investment in technology cost in 2014 and 2015, ensuring that the technology cost in these two years increased by the same fraction of 100 points compared to the previous year (x < 50%). The manufacturing cost decreased by the same fraction of 100 points (2x) in these two years compared to the previous year. 

At the same time, in order to expand sales volume, the sales cost in 2015 will be increased by 10% compared to 2013. After these changes, it is estimated that the total cost of this product in 2015 will reach 4/5 of the total cost in 2013. The value of x is to be determined.

original_text: 滕州自古被誉为“3国5邑之地，文化昌明之邦”，近几年旅游业更是发展迅猛，今年“元旦”放假期间，外来与外出旅游的总人数为22.6万人，分别比去年同期增长了30%和20%，去年同期外来旅游比外出旅游的人数多2万人．求我市去年外来和外出旅游的人数．
new_text: Tengzhou has been known as the "land of the Three Kingdoms and Five Cities, a place of flourishing culture" since ancient times. In recent years, the tourism industry has developed rapidly. During the "New Year" holiday this year, the total number of visitors from outside and those traveling outside reached 226,000, an increase of 30% and 20% respectively compared to the same period last year. Last year, there were 20,000 more visitors from outside than those traveling outside. Please calculate the number of visitors from outside and those traveling outside in our city last year.

original_text: 1张方桌由1个桌面和4条桌脚组成，如果1立方米木材可制作方桌的桌面50个，或制作桌腿300条，现有5立方米木料，那么用多少木料做桌面，用多少木料做桌腿，恰好配套？
new_text: A square table consists of one tabletop and four table legs. If one cubic meter of wood can make 50 tabletops or 300 table legs for the square table, and there are 5 cubic meters of wood available, how much wood is needed for the tabletop and how much wood is needed for the table legs to match exactly?

original_text: 列方程组解应用题：某船顺流航行，每小时行20km，逆流航行，每小时行16km，求船在静水中的航速及水流速度．
new_text: Solving Applied Problems with Systems of Equations: A certain boat travels downstream at a speed of 20 km/h, and upstream at a speed of 16 km/h. Find the speed of the boat in still water and the speed of the water current.

original_text: 银座商场销售某种商品，每件进价为270元，市场调研发现，当销售价为290元时，平均每天能售出8件；而当销售价每降低1元时，平均每天就能多售出4件商场要想使这种商品的销售利润平均每天达到340元，每件商品应降价多少元？
new_text: A certain product is sold in a Ginza shopping mall. The cost price of each item is 270 yuan. Market research has found that when the selling price is 290 yuan, an average of 8 items can be sold per day. However, for every 1 yuan decrease in the selling price, an additional 4 items can be sold per day. The shopping mall wants to achieve an average daily sales profit of 340 yuan for this product. How much should the price of each item be reduced by?

original_text: 在水平桌面上有甲、乙2个内部呈圆柱形的容器，内部底面积分别为80cm^2、100cm^2，且甲容器装满水，乙容器是空的．若将甲中的水全部倒入乙中，则乙中的水位高度比原先甲的水位高度低了8cm，则甲的容积是多少？
new_text: On a horizontal tabletop, there are two cylindrical containers, labeled A and B. The bottom surface areas of the containers are 80cm^2 and 100cm^2 respectively. Container A is filled with water, while container B is empty. If all the water from container A is poured into container B, the water level in container B will be 8cm lower than the original water level in container A. What is the volume of container A?

original_text: 商场某种商品平均每天可销售60件，每件盈利80元，为了尽快减少库存，商场决定采取适当的降价措施，经调查发现，每件商品每降价2元，商场平均每天可多售出10件，在上述条件不变、销售正常的情况下，每件商品降价多少元时，商场日盈利可达到7200元？
new_text: The average daily sales of a certain product in a shopping mall is 60 units, with a profit of 80 yuan per unit. In order to reduce inventory quickly, the shopping mall decides to implement appropriate price reduction measures. After investigation, it is found that for every 2 yuan reduction in price per unit, the shopping mall can sell an additional 10 units per day on average. Under the unchanged conditions and normal sales, how much should the price of each unit be reduced for the shopping mall to achieve a daily profit of 7200 yuan?

original_text: 某酒店客房有3人间、2人间客房，收费标准如下（单位：元/间/天）：3人间普通150，豪华300；2人间140，豪华400。为吸引游客，实行团体入住0.5折优惠．1个40人的旅游团在优惠期间到该酒店入住，住了1些3人间普通和2人间普通客房．若每间客房正好住满，且1天共花去住宿费1220元，则旅游团住了3人间普通和2人间普通客房各多少间？
new_text: A certain hotel has 3-person and 2-person rooms, with the following charges (in yuan/room/day): 3-person standard room 150, deluxe room 300; 2-person room 140, deluxe room 400. In order to attract tourists, a 50% discount is offered for group stays. During the discount period, a 40-person tour group stayed at the hotel, occupying some standard 3-person and 2-person rooms. If each room was fully occupied and a total of 1220 yuan was spent on accommodation for one day, how many standard 3-person and 2-person rooms did the tour group stay in?

original_text: 有2种酒精，1种浓度是60%，另1种浓度为90%，现在要配制成浓度为70%的酒精300克，问：浓度是60%的酒精取多少克？
new_text: There are 2 types of alcohol, one with a concentration of 60% and the other with a concentration of 90%. Now, we need to prepare 300 grams of alcohol with a concentration of 70%. The question is: how many grams of alcohol with a concentration of 60% should be taken?

original_text: 在美化校园的活动中，某兴趣小组想借助如图所示的直角墙角，墙DF足够长，墙DE长为12米，现用20米长的篱笆围成1个矩形花园ABCD，点C在墙DF上，点A在墙DE上，(篱笆只围AB，BC2边)．BC为多少时才能围成矩形花园的面积为75m^2？
new_text: In the activity of beautifying the campus, a certain interest group wants to use the right-angled corner of the wall as shown in the figure. The wall DF is long enough, and the length of wall DE is 12 meters. Now, a 20-meter-long fence is used to enclose a rectangular garden ABCD, where point C is on the wall DF and point A is on the wall DE (the fence only encloses sides AB and BC). What is the length of BC in order to enclose a rectangular garden with an area of 75 square meters?

original_text: 苏州某旅行社组织甲乙2个旅游团分别到西安、北京旅行，已知这2旅游团共有55人，甲旅游团的人数比乙旅游团的人数的2倍少5人．问甲、乙2个旅游团各有多少人？
new_text: A travel agency in Suzhou organized two tour groups, Group A and Group B, to travel to Xi'an and Beijing respectively. It is known that the two tour groups have a total of 55 people. The number of people in Group A is 5 less than twice the number of people in Group B. How many people are in each of the two tour groups?

original_text: 组织1次篮球联赛，每2队之间都赛1场，计划安排15场比赛，应邀请多少个球队参加比赛．
new_text: "Organize a basketball league, with each team playing one game against each other team. There are plans to arrange 15 games. How many teams should be invited to participate in the competition?"

original_text: 新学期开学第一天，9(1)班男同学之间用握手的方式互致问候，全班男同学1共握手300次；男女同学之间没有互致问候则班上男同学有几名？
new_text: On the first day of the new semester, the male students in Class 9(1) greeted each other with handshakes. The male students in the class shook hands a total of 300 times. If there were no greetings between male and female students, how many male students are there in the class?

original_text: 某商场用15.5万元购进甲、乙2种品牌手机共50部，已知甲品牌手机的进货价是4000元，乙品牌的进货价是2500元，该商场购进甲、乙2种品牌手机各多少部？
new_text: A certain shopping mall purchased a total of 50 units of two brands of mobile phones, brand A and brand B, for a total of 155,000 yuan. It is known that the purchase price of brand A phones is 4,000 yuan, and the purchase price of brand B phones is 2,500 yuan. How many units of brand A and brand B phones did the shopping mall purchase?

original_text: 某市为了鼓励居民节约用水，对自来水用户按用水量分段收费：若每月用水不超过6吨，按每吨2元收费；若每月用水超过6吨，则超过6吨的部分按每吨3元收费，其余部分仍按2元收费．若该市某户居民8月份交水费33元，问：该户居民8月份的用水量是多少吨？
new_text: A city encourages residents to save water by charging them based on their water usage. If the monthly water usage does not exceed 6 tons, the charge is 2 yuan per ton. If the monthly water usage exceeds 6 tons, the excess amount is charged at 3 yuan per ton, while the remaining amount is still charged at 2 yuan per ton. If a resident of the city paid 33 yuan for water in August, the question is: how many tons of water did the resident use in August?

original_text: 岳1中3初某学生聆听了感恩励志主题演讲《不要让爱你的人失望》后，写了1份《改变，从现在开始》的倡议书在微信朋友圈传播，规则为：将倡议书发表在自己的朋友圈，再邀请x个好友转发倡议书，每个好友转发倡议书之后，又邀请x个互不相同的好友转发倡议书，依此类推，已知经过2轮传播后，共有421人参与了传播活动，求x的值
new_text: A student from Yue 1 Middle School listened to a gratitude and inspirational speech titled "Don't Disappoint Those Who Love You" and wrote an initiative called "Change, Starting from Now" to spread on WeChat Moments. The rules are as follows: publish the initiative on your own Moments and then invite x friends to repost it. After each friend reposts the initiative, they should invite x different friends to repost it as well. This process continues, and it is known that after 2 rounds of spreading, a total of 421 people participated in the activity. The value of x is requested.

original_text: 甲数的2倍比乙数大3，甲数的3倍比乙数的2倍小1，求甲乙2数。
new_text:
The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"The double of number A is 3 greater than number B, and the triple of number A is 1 less than twice number B. Find the values of numbers A and B."

original_text: 为加强公民节水意识，合理利用水资源，某市采用如下水费计费方式：用水量：不超过6m^3，单价：2元/m^3；超过6m^3不到10mm^3，单价：4元/m^3；超出10m^3，单价：8元/m^3，如果该用户3、4月份共用水15m^3（4月比3月多），共交水费44元，则该用户3月份用水多少m^3？
new_text:
To strengthen citizens' awareness of water conservation and rational use of water resources, a certain city adopts the following water fee billing method: 
- Water consumption: not exceeding 6m^3, unit price: 2 yuan/m^3 
- Water consumption: over 6m^3 but less than 10m^3, unit price: 4 yuan/m^3 
- Water consumption: exceeding 10m^3, unit price: 8 yuan/m^3 

If a user in this city uses a total of 15m^3 of water in the months of March and April (with April having more water usage than March) and pays a total water fee of 44 yuan, how much water did the user consume in March?

original_text: 甲、乙两人同时从相距25千米的A地去B地，甲骑车乙步行，甲的速度是乙的速度的3倍，甲到达B地停留40分钟，然后从B地返回A地，在途中遇见乙，这时距他们出发的时间恰好3小时，求乙的速度是多少？
new_text: Person A and person B both leave from point A to point B, which are 25 kilometers apart. Person A rides a bike while person B walks. Person A's speed is 3 times that of person B. Person A arrives at point B and stays for 40 minutes, then returns to point A. On the way back, person A meets person B, and at that time, it has been exactly 3 hours since they both started. What is person B's speed?

original_text: 若某商品的原价为100元，连续2次涨价后的售价为144元，2次平均增长率为多少？
new_text: If the original price of a certain product is 100 yuan, and after two consecutive price increases, the selling price is 144 yuan, what is the average growth rate for the two increases?

original_text: 列方程组解应用题：某服装店购进1批甲、乙2种款式时尚T恤衫，用14200元恰好购进100件，已知甲种款型T恤进价为130元/件，且甲种款型的每件进价比乙种款型每件进价少30元。（1）求甲、乙2种款型的T恤各购进多少件？
new_text: Solving equation application problem: A certain clothing store purchased a batch of two styles of fashionable T-shirts, A and B. They spent exactly 14,200 yuan to buy 100 pieces. It is known that the purchase price of style A T-shirts is 130 yuan per piece, and the purchase price of style A T-shirts is 30 yuan less than the purchase price of style B T-shirts per piece. (1) Find out how many pieces of style A and style B T-shirts were purchased.

original_text: 某小区在绿化工程中有1块长为18m、宽为6m的矩形空地，计划在其中修建2块相同的矩形绿地，使它们的面积之和为60m^2，2块绿地之间及周边留有宽度相等的人行通道，求人行通道的宽度．
new_text: In a certain residential area, there is a rectangular vacant land with a length of 18m and a width of 6m. The plan is to build two identical rectangular green spaces within it, so that the sum of their areas is 60m^2. There will be pedestrian walkways of equal width between and around the two green spaces. Find the width of the pedestrian walkway.

original_text: 有2个连续整数，它们的平方和为25，则较小那个数是多少？
new_text: There are 2 consecutive integers whose sum of squares is 25. What is the smaller number?

original_text: 《9章算术》中有这样道题，原文如下：今有共买豕，人出100，盈100，人出90，适足，问人数、豕价各几何？大意为：今有人合伙买猪，每人出100钱，则会多出100钱；每人出90钱，恰好合适，问合伙的人数、猪价各是多少？
new_text:
The following is the translation of the Chinese text to English:

In Chapter 9 of Arithmetic, there is a problem as follows: The original text is as follows: "Today, a group of people jointly bought pigs. Each person contributed 100 units of money, resulting in an excess of 100 units. If each person contributed 90 units of money, it would be just enough. The question is, how many people are in the group and what is the price of each pig?"

original_text: 某市出租车收费标准是：起步价10元，可乘3千米，3千米到5千米，每千米1.3元，超过5千米，每千米2.4元，若小张租1次车付了24.6元，求小张租车所走的路程．
new_text: The taxi fare standard in a certain city is as follows: the starting price is 10 yuan, and you can travel up to 3 kilometers. For distances between 3 and 5 kilometers, the fare is 1.3 yuan per kilometer. For distances exceeding 5 kilometers, the fare is 2.4 yuan per kilometer. If Xiaozhang paid 24.6 yuan for one taxi ride, we need to calculate the distance Xiaozhang traveled.

- Up to 6 tons, unit price (in yuan/ton): 2 
- More than 6 tons but not exceeding 10 tons, unit price (in yuan/ton): 4 
- More than 10 tons, unit price (in yuan/ton): 8 

If a resident used 9 tons of water in January, the water fee would be calculated as follows: 6 * 2 + 4 * (9 - 6) = 24 yuan.

original_text: 1本书封面的周长为50cm，长比宽多5cm．这本书封面的长是多少？（请用1元1次方程解决问题）
new_text:
The perimeter of the book cover is 50cm, and the length is 5cm more than the width. What is the length of the book cover? (Please solve the problem using a first-degree equation)

To solve this problem, we can set up the equation as follows:

Let x be the width of the book cover.
Then, the length of the book cover is x + 5.

The perimeter of a rectangle is given by the formula: P = 2(length + width).
In this case, the perimeter is 50cm.

So, we can write the equation as:
50 = 2(x + (x + 5))

Simplifying the equation:
50 = 2(2x + 5)
50 = 4x + 10
40 = 4x
x = 10

Therefore, the width of the book cover is 10cm, and the length is 10 + 5 = 15cm.

The clothing factory has provided a price list for the uniforms: purchasing 1 to 39 sets of uniforms costs 80 yuan per set; purchasing 40 to 79 sets costs 70 yuan per set; purchasing 80 sets or more costs 60 yuan per set. Please answer the following question: (2) How many students are there in Team A and Team B respectively?

original_text: 甲、乙2个2位数，如果甲数放在乙数的左边，组成的4位数是乙数的201倍；若把乙数放在甲数的左边，组成的4位数比上面的4位数小1188，则甲、乙两数分别为？

original_text: 1客轮船长江从A港顺流到达B港需6小时，从B港逆流到A港需8小时，1天，客轮从A港出发开往B港，2小时后，客轮上的1位旅客的帽子不慎落入江中，则帽子漂流到B港需要多少小时？

In one day, the passenger ship departs from Port A to Port B. After 2 hours, one passenger's hat accidentally falls into the river. How many hours will it take for the hat to drift to Port B?"

original_text: 某学校举办1次数学知识竞赛活动，竞赛题共有25道题，规定做对1道题得4分，不做或做错1道题扣1分．李伟最后竞赛成绩是90分，那么李伟1共做对了几道题？
new_text: A school held a math knowledge competition, with a total of 25 questions. If Li Wei's final score in the competition was 90 points, how many questions did Li Wei get right in total?

original_text: 去年2月“蒜你狠”风潮又1次来袭，某市蔬菜批发市场大蒜价格猛涨，原来单价4元/千克的大蒜，经过2月和3月连续2个月增长后，价格上升很快，物价部门紧急出台相关政策控制价格，4月大蒜价格下降了36%，恰好与涨价前的价格相同，则2月，3月的平均增长率为多少？
new_text: Last February, the "Garlic You Mean" trend struck again. The price of garlic in a certain city's vegetable wholesale market soared. Originally priced at 4 yuan per kilogram, the price of garlic rose rapidly after two consecutive months of growth in February and March. The price control department urgently issued relevant policies to control prices. In April, the price of garlic dropped by 36%, which happened to be the same as the price before the increase. What is the average growth rate in February and March?

original_text: 某城市按以下规定收取用户每月的煤气费：某用户用气如果不超过60m^3，按每立方米0.8元收费；如果超过60m^3，超过部分按每立方米1.2元收费；已知某用户4月份煤气费平均每立方米0.96元，那么，4月份这位用户应交煤气费多少元？
new_text:
A certain city charges users for their monthly gas fees according to the following regulations: If a user consumes no more than 60m^3 of gas, they are charged 0.8 yuan per cubic meter. If the consumption exceeds 60m^3, the excess is charged at a rate of 1.2 yuan per cubic meter. It is known that the average gas fee for a certain user in April is 0.96 yuan per cubic meter. Therefore, how much should this user pay for gas fees in April?

To solve this problem, we need to calculate the total gas consumption and then determine the corresponding fee. 

Let's assume the total gas consumption in April for this user is X m^3. 

If X is less than or equal to 60m^3, the fee can be calculated as follows: 
Fee = X * 0.8 yuan per cubic meter. 

If X is greater than 60m^3, the fee can be calculated as follows: 
Fee = (60 * 0.8) + (X - 60) * 1.2 yuan. 

Since the average gas fee for this user in April is 0.96 yuan per cubic meter, we can set up the following equation: 
(60 * 0.8) + (X - 60) * 1.2 = X * 0.96. 

Simplifying the equation, we get: 
48 + 1.2X - 72 = 0.96X. 

Combining like terms, we have: 
0.24X = 24. 

Dividing both sides by 0.24, we find: 
X = 100. 

Therefore, the total gas consumption for this user in April is 100m^3. 

Now, let's calculate the gas fee: 
If X is less than or equal to 60m^3, the fee is: 
Fee = 100 * 0.8 = 80 yuan. 

If X is greater than 60m^3, the fee is: 
Fee = (60 * 0.8) + (100 - 60) * 1.2 = 48 + 48 = 96 yuan. 

Since the total gas consumption in April for this user is 100m^3, the gas fee they should pay is 96 yuan.

original_text: 轮船从甲地顺水开往乙地，所用时间比从乙地逆水开往甲地少1.5小时．已知船在静水的速度为18千米/小时，水流速度为2千米/小时，则甲、乙2地之间的距离为多少千米．
new_text: The ship travels downstream from point A to point B, and it takes 1.5 hours less time than traveling upstream from point B to point A. It is known that the speed of the ship in still water is 18 kilometers per hour, and the speed of the water flow is 2 kilometers per hour. What is the distance between points A and B in kilometers?

original_text: 小明的妈妈在菜市场买回3斤萝卜、2斤排骨，准备做萝卜排骨汤．妈妈说：“今天买这2样菜共花了45元，上月买同重量的这2种菜只要36元”；爸爸说：“报纸上说了萝卜的单价上涨50%，排骨单价上涨20%”；小明说：爸爸、妈妈，我想知道今天买的萝卜的单价是多少？请你通过列1元1次方程求解这天萝卜的单价（单位：元/斤）．
new_text: Little Ming's mother bought 3 kilograms of radishes and 2 kilograms of pork ribs from the market, preparing to make radish and pork rib soup. His mother said, "Today, these two ingredients cost a total of 45 yuan. Last month, the same weight of these two ingredients only cost 36 yuan." His father said, "The newspaper said that the price of radishes has increased by 50%, and the price of pork ribs has increased by 20%." Little Ming said, "Mom and Dad, I want to know the unit price of the radishes we bought today. Please solve the equation by setting the price of radishes as x yuan per kilogram."

original_text: 刘俊问王老师的年龄时，王老师说：“我像你这么大时，你才3岁；等你到了我这么大时，我就45岁了问王老师、刘俊今年分别多少岁
new_text: When Liu Jun asked Teacher Wang about his age, Teacher Wang said, "When I was your age, you were only 3 years old; when you reach my age, I will be 45 years old." Please ask Teacher Wang and Liu Jun how old they are this year.

original_text: 某中学矩形校运会，2初（1）班同学准备用卡纸制成乒乓球拍和小旗作道具．若1张卡纸可以做3个球拍或6面小旗，用21张卡纸，刚好能够让每位同学拿1个球拍和1面小旗．）应用多少张卡纸做球拍？

If 1 piece of cardboard can make 3 paddles or 6 flags, and they have 21 pieces of cardboard, exactly enough for each student to have 1 paddle and 1 flag, how many pieces of cardboard should be used to make the paddles?

original_text: 由甲、乙2运输队承包运输15000立方米沙石的任务，要求在10天之内(包含10天)完成已知2队共有20辆汽车且全部参与运输，甲队每辆车每天能够运输100立方米的沙石，乙队每辆车每天能够运输80立方米的沙石，前3天2队1共运输了5520立方米．求甲乙2队各有多少辆汽车？

In the first 3 days, the two teams together transported a total of 5,520 cubic meters. How many cars are there in Team A and Team B respectively?

original_text: 小颖和她的爸爸1起玩投篮球游戏2人商定规则为：小颖投中1个得3分，爸爸投中1个得1分，结果2人1共投中了20个，1计算，发现2人的得分刚好相等，你知道他们2人各投中几个吗？

original_text: 小华从家里到学校的路是1段平路和1段下坡路，假设他始终保持平路每分钟走60米，下坡路每分钟走80米，上坡路每分钟走40米，从家里到学校需10分钟，从学校到家里需15分钟从小华家到学校的下坡路长多少米？平路为多少米？

original_text: 某农场要建1个面积为130平方米的矩形养鸡场，鸡场的1边靠墙(墙长16米)，另3边用长为32米的木板围成，并在与墙平行的1边开1道1米宽的门(门用其它材料制成)，求矩形养鸡场的宽．

original_text: 学校书法兴趣小组准备到文具店购买A、B2种类型的毛笔，文具店的销售方法是：1次性购买A型毛笔不超过20支时，按0售价销售；超过20支时，超过部分每支比0售价低0.4元，其余部分仍按0售价销售．1次性购买B型毛笔不超过15支时，按0售价销售；超过15支时，超过部分每支比0售价低0.6元，其余的部分仍按0售价销售．（1）如果全组共有20名同学，若每人各买1支型毛笔和2支B型毛笔，共支付145元；若每人各买2支A型毛笔和1支B型毛笔，共支付129元，这家文具店的A、B型毛笔的0售价各是多少？

original_text: 随着新农村建设的进一步加快，农村居民人均纯收入增长迅速．据统计，某市农村居民人均纯收入由2012年的14000元增长到2014年的16940元，则这个市从2012年到2014年的年平均增长的100分率是多少？

original_text: 1批货物要运往某地，货主准备租用汽车运输公司的甲、乙2种货车，已知过去2次租用这种货车的情况如下所示：第一次租用2辆甲货车和3辆乙货车共运输15.5吨货物，第二次租用5辆甲货车和6辆乙货车共运输35吨货物。现租用该公司的甲种货车3辆乙种货车5辆，1次刚好运完这批货物，甲种车和乙种车每辆装多少吨？

original_text: 某单位计划元旦组织员工到某地旅游，A、B2旅行社的服务质量相同，且到地的旅游价格都是每人300元，已知A旅行社表示可给每人0.75折优惠，B旅行社可免去1人费用，其余0.8折优惠当该单位旅游人数为多少时，支付A、B2旅行社的总费用相同？

original_text: 2015年“植树节”前夕，某小区为绿化环境，购进200棵柏树苗和120棵枣树苗，且2种树苗所需费用相同．每棵枣树苗的进价比每棵柏树苗的进价的2倍少5元，每棵柏树苗的进价是多少元？

original_text: 甲、乙2同学分别从相距125米的A、B2地同时出发，相向而行，向对方目的地而去，2人的平均速度分别为10米/分，15米/分，则经过多少分，2人第二次相距25米？

original_text: 学校校办工厂需制作1块广告牌，请来师徒2人，已知师傅单独完成需4天，徒弟单独完成需6天，现由徒弟先做1天，再2人合作，完成整个工作，2人合作需要多少天？
new_text: The school needs to make a billboard for the school factory. They need two people, a master and an apprentice. original_text: 新一轮对口援疆工作开展以来，广东省安排援疆专项资金，为喀什地区某中学新建了1栋4层的教学大楼，每层楼有8间教室，进出这栋大楼共有4道门，其中2道正门大小相同，2道侧门大小相同，安全检查中，对4道门进行了测试：当同时开启1道正门和2道侧门时，2分钟可以通过560名学生；当同时开启1道正门和1道侧门时，4分钟可以通过800名学生。(1)求平均每分钟1道正门和1道侧门各可以通过多少名学生？

Each floor of the building has 8 classrooms, and there are a total of 4 doors for entering and exiting the building. Among them, 2 main doors are the same size, and 2 side doors are the same size. During the safety inspection, the 4 doors were tested: when 1 main door and 2 side doors are opened at the same time, 560 students can pass through in 2 minutes; when 1 main door and 1 side door are opened at the same time, 800 students can pass through in 4 minutes.
