new_text: After two price reductions, the price per box of a certain medicine has decreased from 50 yuan to 32 yuan. What is the average percentage of each price reduction?

original_text: 小明在新亚100货大楼以0.8折（即标价的80%）的优惠价买了12沃特牌运动鞋，节省了45元，那么小明买鞋子时应付给营业员多少元？
new_text: Xiao Ming bought 12 pairs of Watt brand sports shoes at a discounted price of 80% off (which is 20% of the original price) at the New Asia 100 Mall, saving 45 yuan. How much should Xiao Ming pay the salesperson for the shoes?

original_text: 为了丰富村民业余文化生活，某开发区某村民委员会动员村民自愿集资建立1个书、报、刊阅览室．经预算，1共需要筹资50000元，其中1部分用于购买桌、凳、柜凳设施，另1部分用于购买书、报、刊．经初步统计，有250户村民自愿参与集资，那么平均每户需要资金200元．开发区管委会了解情况后，赠送了1批阅览室设施和书、报、刊．这样，只需参与户共集资36000元．经村委会进一步宣传，自愿参与的户数在250户的基础上增加了x%(其中x＞0)．则每户平均集资的资金在200元的基础上减少了2x%，求x的值．
new_text: In order to enrich the cultural life of the villagers, a certain village committee in a development zone mobilized the villagers to voluntarily raise funds to establish a reading room for books, newspapers, and magazines. According to the budget, a total of 50,000 yuan is needed, part of which will be used to purchase tables, chairs, and cabinets, and the other part will be used to purchase books, newspapers, and magazines. According to preliminary statistics, 250 households voluntarily participated in the fundraising, so on average, each household needs 200 yuan. After understanding the situation, the management committee of the development zone donated a batch of reading room facilities and books, newspapers, and magazines. Therefore, only 36,000 yuan needs to be raised by the participating households. After further promotion by the village committee, the number of households voluntarily participating increased by x% (where x > 0) based on the initial 250 households. The amount of funds raised per household decreased by 2x% based on the initial 200 yuan. Find the value of x.

original_text: 今年我校准备购买1批办公桌椅，现从甲乙2家家具公司了解到：1同款式的桌椅价格相同，1套桌椅总价280元，办公桌价格是椅子的3倍．甲公司的优惠政策是：每买1张办公桌赠送1把椅子，多买的椅子按原价付款；乙公司的优惠政策是：办公桌和椅子都实行0.8折优惠．若购买20张办公桌和x（x不少于20）把椅子，当x为多少时，甲、乙2家公司付款1样多．
new_text: This year our school is preparing to purchase a batch of office desks and chairs. We have learned from two furniture companies, Company A and Company B, that the price of the same style of desks and chairs is the same. The total price for a set of desks and chairs is 280 yuan, and the price of a desk is three times that of a chair. Company A's discount policy is: for every desk purchased, one chair is given for free, and any additional chairs are charged at the original price. Company B's discount policy is: both desks and chairs are discounted at 20% off. If we purchase 20 desks and x (where x is not less than 20) chairs, at what value of x will Company A and Company B have the same payment amount?

original_text: 小强比他叔叔小30岁，而2年前，小强的年龄是他叔叔的1/4，则小强的叔叔今年多少岁？
new_text: Xiaoqiang is 30 years younger than his uncle, and 2 years ago, Xiaoqiang's age was 1/4 of his uncle's. How old is Xiaoqiang's uncle this year?

original_text: 某班学生参加运土劳动，1部分学生抬土，另1部分学生挑土，已知全班共用箩筐99个，扁担66根，求抬土、挑土的学生各有多少人？
new_text: A group of students participated in manual labor. Some students carried soil, while others carried it on their shoulders. It is known that the whole class used a total of 99 baskets and 66 poles. How many students carried soil and how many students carried it on their shoulders?

original_text: 小丽买苹果和桔子，如果买4千克苹果和2千克桔子，共花费18元；如果买2千克苹果和4千克桔子，共花费16.8元，求苹果和桔子每千克各多少元？
new_text: Xiao Li bought apples and oranges. If she bought 4 kilograms of apples and 2 kilograms of oranges, she spent a total of 18 yuan. If she bought 2 kilograms of apples and 4 kilograms of oranges, she spent a total of 16.8 yuan. What is the price per kilogram for apples and oranges?

original_text: 根据下面的对话：昨天，我们8个人去看电影，买门票花了195元，每张成人票30元，每张儿童票15元，他们到底几个成人，几个儿童。求出去了几个成年人和儿童。
new_text: According to the following dialogue: Yesterday, 8 of us went to see a movie. We spent 195 yuan on tickets. Each adult ticket costs 30 yuan, and each child ticket costs 15 yuan. How many adults and children were there in total? Calculate the number of adults and children who went.

original_text: 张大叔从市场上买回1块矩形铁皮，他将此矩形铁皮的4个角各剪去1个边长为1米的正方形后，剩下的部分刚好能围成1个容积为15m^3的无盖长方体箱子，且此长方体箱子的底面长比宽多2米，长方体箱子宽为多少？
new_text: Uncle Zhang bought a rectangular sheet of iron measuring 1 square meter from the market. After cutting off a square with a side length of 1 meter from each of the four corners of the rectangular sheet, he was left with a remaining piece that could be folded into a rectangular box with a volume of 15 cubic meters. The length of the base of this rectangular box is 2 meters longer than its width. What is the width of the rectangular box?

original_text: 61儿童节前夊，某儿童服装店用3360元购进A、B2种童装共120套，其中A型童装每套24元，B型童装每套36元，求购买A、B童装分别是多少套。
new_text: Before Children's Day, a certain children's clothing store purchased 120 sets of A and B2 types of children's clothing for a total of 3360 yuan. Among them, each set of A-type children's clothing costs 24 yuan, and each set of B-type children's clothing costs 36 yuan. Please calculate how many sets of A and B children's clothing were purchased.

original_text: 某淘宝网店销售台灯，成本为每个30元．销售大数据分析表明：当每个台灯售价为40元时，平均每月售出600个；若售价每上涨1元，其月销售量就减少20个，若售价每下降1元，其月销售量就增加200个．为迎接“201”，该网店决定降价促销，在库存为1210个台灯的情况下，若预计月获利恰好为8400元，求每个台灯的售价．
new_text: A certain Taobao online store sells desk lamps at a cost of 30 yuan each. Sales data analysis shows that when the selling price of each desk lamp is 40 yuan, an average of 600 lamps are sold per month. If the selling price increases by 1 yuan, the monthly sales volume decreases by 20 lamps. If the selling price decreases by 1 yuan, the monthly sales volume increases by 200 lamps. In order to welcome the "201" (presumably referring to the new year), the online store decides to reduce the price for promotion. With a stock of 1210 desk lamps, and an expected monthly profit of exactly 8400 yuan, the selling price of each desk lamp is to be determined.

original_text: 随着国家抑制房价政策的出台，某楼盘房价连续2次下跌，由原来的每平方米5000元降至每平方米4050元，设每次降价的100分率相同，则降价100分率为多少？
new_text: With the introduction of the national policy to suppress housing prices, the price of a certain property has fallen for two consecutive times, from the original 5000 yuan per square meter to 4050 yuan per square meter. Assuming the percentage decrease in price is the same for each time, what is the percentage decrease?

original_text: 某公司到果园基地购买某种优质水果，果园基地对购买3000千克以上（含3000千克）者有2种销售方案．甲方案：每千克9元，由基地送货上门；乙方案：每千克8元，由顾客自己租车运回．已知该公司从基地到公司的运费为5000元，若购买量在3000千克以上，问当购买多少千克时2种方案付款方式1样
new_text: A certain company is purchasing a certain type of high-quality fruit from a fruit orchard base. The fruit orchard base has two sales plans for purchases of 3000 kilograms or more (including 3000 kilograms). Plan A: 9 yuan per kilogram, with delivery to the company by the base. Plan B: 8 yuan per kilogram, with customers renting a car to transport the fruit themselves. It is known that the transportation cost from the base to the company is 5000 yuan. If the purchase quantity is above 3000 kilograms, at what quantity will the payment method be the same for both plans?

original_text: 车间有工人84人，平均每人每天加工大齿轮16个或小齿轮10个，又知1个大齿轮和2个小齿轮配成1套，问应安排多少人生产大齿轮使生产的产品刚好成套？
new_text: In the workshop, there are 84 workers. On average, each person can process 16 large gears or 10 small gears per day. It is also known that 1 set consists of 1 large gear and 2 small gears. How many people should be assigned to produce large gears so that the products are just enough to form complete sets?

original_text: 某公司2月份的利润为160万元，4月份的利润250万元，则平均每月的增长率为多少？
new_text: The translation of the Chinese text is: "A company's profit in February was 1.6 million yuan, and the profit in April was 2.5 million yuan. What is the average monthly growth rate?"

original_text: 我校9年级组织1次班际篮球赛，若赛制为单循环形式(每2班之间都赛1场)，则需安排45场比赛．问共有多少个班级球队参加比赛？
new_text: Our school's 9th grade organizes a class basketball tournament. If the tournament format is a single round-robin (each pair of classes plays one game), then 45 games need to be scheduled. How many class teams are participating in the tournament?

original_text: 大丰区自来水公司为限制单位用水，每月只给某单位计划内用水300吨，计划内用水每吨收费3.4元，超计划部分每吨按4.6元收费．若某月该单位缴纳水费1572元，则该单位用水多少吨？
new_text:
The translation of the Chinese text is as follows:

"The Dafeng District Water Company limits the water usage for certain units to 300 tons per month. The charge for water usage within the plan is 3.4 yuan per ton, while any usage exceeding the plan is charged at 4.6 yuan per ton. If a certain unit pays a water fee of 1572 yuan in a month, how many tons of water did the unit use?"

original_text: 小李用28元钱买了甲、乙2种水果，甲种水果每千克4元，乙种水果每千克6元，且乙中水果比甲中水果少买了2千克，求小李2种水果各买多少千克？设小李买甲种水果x千克，乙种水果y千克，
new_text: Xiao Li bought two types of fruits, A and B, for a total of 28 yuan. Type A costs 4 yuan per kilogram, while type B costs 6 yuan per kilogram. Additionally, Xiao Li bought 2 kilograms less of type B compared to type A. We need to find out how many kilograms of each type of fruit Xiao Li bought. Let's assume Xiao Li bought x kilograms of type A and y kilograms of type B.

original_text: 某校准备组织7年级学生参加夏令营，已知：用3辆小客车和1辆大客车每次可运送学生105人；用1辆小客车和2辆大客车每次可运送学生110人，现有学生400人，计划租用小客车a辆，大客车b辆，1次送完，且恰好每辆车都坐满．(1)1辆小客车和1辆大客车都坐满后1次分别可送多少名学生？
new_text: A certain school is preparing to organize a summer camp for 7th grade students. It is known that with 3 small buses and 1 large bus, they can transport 105 students at a time. With 1 small bus and 2 large buses, they can transport 110 students at a time. There are currently 400 students, and the plan is to rent a small bus (a) and a large bus (b) to transport all the students in one trip, with each bus being completely full. (1) After filling up one small bus and one large bus, how many students can be transported in one trip for each bus?

original_text: 某超市1月份的营业额为200万元，3月份的营业额为288万元，如果每月比上月增长的100分数相同，则平均每月的增长率为多少？
new_text: The revenue of a certain supermarket in January was 2 million yuan, and the revenue in March was 2.88 million yuan. If the percentage increase compared to the previous month is the same every month, what is the average monthly growth rate?

original_text: 某学校第一季度共节约煤3700千克，其中2月份比1月份多节约20%，3月份比2月份多节约25%，则这个学校3月份节约煤多少千克？
new_text: A certain school saved a total of 3700 kilograms of coal in the first quarter. In February, the savings were 20% more than in January, and in March, the savings were 25% more than in February. How many kilograms of coal did the school save in March?

original_text: 某商场经销1种商品，由于进货时价格比原进价降低了6.4%，使得利润率增加了8个100分点，那么经销这种商品原来的利润率是多少？（注：利润率=（销售价-进价）/进价）．
new_text: A certain shopping mall sells a type of product. Due to a decrease in the purchase price by 6.4% compared to the original cost, the profit margin increased by 8 percentage points. What was the original profit margin for selling this product? (Note: Profit margin = (selling price - purchase price) / purchase price).

original_text: 小程、小芳2人相距10km，小程骑自行车、小芳步行，若2人同时出发相向而行，则1h后相遇；若2人同时出发同向而行，则小程2h可追上小芳，求小程骑自行车的平均速度为多少km/h？小芳步行的平均速度为多少km/h？
new_text: Xiao Cheng and Xiao Fang are 10km apart. Xiao Cheng rides a bicycle while Xiao Fang walks. If they both start at the same time and walk towards each other, they will meet after 1 hour. If they both start at the same time and walk in the same direction, Xiao Cheng can catch up to Xiao Fang after 2 hours. What is the average speed of Xiao Cheng riding the bicycle in km/h? What is the average speed of Xiao Fang walking in km/h?

original_text: 某电子商铺购进1批电子配件，其进价为每件40元，按每件60元出售，平均每天可售出100件，经过市场调查发现，单价每降低2元，平均每天的销售量可增加20件．现在该商铺要尽快减少库存，采取降价措施，并且平均每天获利2240元，那么每件应定价多少元？
new_text: A certain electronic store purchased a batch of electronic accessories at a cost of 40 yuan per item. They sell them for 60 yuan per item. On average, they can sell 100 items per day. After conducting market research, it was found that for every 2 yuan decrease in price, the average daily sales volume increases by 20 items. Now, the store wants to reduce its inventory as quickly as possible by implementing a price reduction measure. They also want to make an average daily profit of 2240 yuan. What should be the price per item?

original_text: 将1条长为40cm的铁丝剪成2段，并以每1段铁丝的长度为周长做成1个正方形．要使这2个正方形的面积之和等于52cm^2，那么这段铁丝剪成2段后较短的1段是多少cm？
new_text: Cut a 40cm long wire into 2 pieces and use the length of each piece as the perimeter to make a square. In order for the sum of the areas of these 2 squares to be 52cm^2, how long is the shorter piece of wire after it is cut into 2 pieces?

original_text: 青藏铁路于2006年7月1日胜利通车，青藏高原天堑变通途，圆了几代人的梦想．作为世界上海拔最高，施工难度最大的铁路，青藏铁路全县有1座大桥-拉萨河大桥（如图）全长920多米，其中主桥长800米，小明在去年暑假乘T22次列车从北京到拉萨游玩，小明为了探究T22次列车的长度与速度，记录了以下2个数据：火车完全在主桥上的时间为35秒，火车上主桥到完全通过主桥用了45秒，知道这2个数据后，求T22次列车的长度与速度
new_text: The Qinghai-Tibet Railway was successfully opened on July 1, 2006, turning the natural barrier of the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau into a convenient passage and fulfilling the dreams of several generations. As the highest-altitude and most difficult railway in the world, the Qinghai-Tibet Railway has one major bridge - the Lhasa River Bridge (as shown in the picture) - with a total length of over 920 meters, including a main bridge that is 800 meters long. Last summer vacation, Xiaoming took the T22 train from Beijing to Lhasa for sightseeing. In order to investigate the length and speed of the T22 train, Xiaoming recorded the following two data points: it took 35 seconds for the train to completely cross the main bridge, and it took 45 seconds from the train being on the main bridge to completely passing through it. With these two pieces of data, we can calculate the length and speed of the T22 train.

original_text: 100货大楼服装柜在销售中发现：某品牌童装每件成本60元，现以每件100元销售，平均每天可售出20件为了迎接“5⋅1”劳动节，商场决定采取适当的降价措施，以扩大销售量，增加盈利，尽量减少库存经市场调查发现：如果每件童装降价1元，那么平均每天就可多销售2件要想平均每天销售这种童装盈利1200元，请你帮商场算一算，每件童装应定价多少元？
new_text:
The text translates to:

"In the sales of the clothing cabinets in the 100 Mall, it was found that a certain brand of children's clothing has a cost of 60 yuan per piece. It is currently being sold at 100 yuan per piece, and an average of 20 pieces can be sold per day. In order to welcome the "May 1st" Labor Day, the mall has decided to take appropriate price reduction measures to expand sales volume, increase profits, and minimize inventory. Through market research, it was found that if the price of each piece of children's clothing is reduced by 1 yuan, an average of 2 more pieces can be sold per day. In order to achieve a profit of 1200 yuan per day from the sale of this type of children's clothing, please help the mall calculate how much each piece of children's clothing should be priced at."

original_text: 某市公园的门票价格如下所示：购票人数在1~50人则票价为10元1人；购票人数在51~100人则票价为8元1人；狗屁哦啊人数在100人以上则票价为5元1人。某校1初年级甲乙2个班共100多人，去该公园举行联欢活动，其中甲班有50多人乙班不足50人，如果以班为单位买门票，1共要付920元；如果2个班1起买票，1共要付515元甲、乙2班分别有多少人？
new_text: The ticket prices for a certain city's park are as follows: If the number of ticket buyers is between 1 and 50, the ticket price is 10 yuan per person; if the number of ticket buyers is between 51 and 100, the ticket price is 8 yuan per person; if the number of ticket buyers is over 100, the ticket price is 5 yuan per person. In a certain school, there are two classes, Class A and Class B, in the first grade, with a total of over 100 students. They are going to the park for a celebration activity, with Class A having over 50 students and Class B having less than 50 students. If they buy tickets by class, the total cost is 920 yuan; if both classes buy tickets together, the total cost is 515 yuan. How many students are there in Class A and Class B respectively?

original_text: A，B2地间的路程为448千米，1列慢车从A站出发，每小时行驶60千米，1列快车从B站出发，每小时行驶80千米，问：2车同时出发，相向而行，快车开出后多少小时2车相遇？
new_text: The distance between stations A and B2 is 448 kilometers. A slow train departs from station A and travels at a speed of 60 kilometers per hour, while a fast train departs from station B and travels at a speed of 80 kilometers per hour. The question is: if both trains depart at the same time and travel towards each other, how many hours will it take for the two trains to meet?

original_text: 某超市将进货单价为40元的商品按50元出售，每天可卖500个，如果这种商品每涨价1元，其销售量就减少10个，超市为使这种商品每天赚得8000元的利润，商品的售价应定为每件多少元？
new_text: A certain supermarket sells goods with a purchase price of 40 yuan for 50 yuan. They can sell 500 of these goods every day. If the price of this kind of goods increases by 1 yuan, the sales volume decreases by 10. In order for the supermarket to make a profit of 8000 yuan per day from these goods, the selling price of the goods should be set at how much per item?

original_text: 甲以每小时3千米的速度出门散步，10分钟后，乙沿着甲所走的路线以每小时4千米的速度追赶，则乙追上甲时，乙走了多少小时？
new_text: "A walks out for a stroll at a speed of 3 kilometers per hour. After 10 minutes, B starts chasing A along the same route at a speed of 4 kilometers per hour. When B catches up with A, how many hours has B been walking?"

original_text: （我国古代问题）：跑得快的马每天走240里，跑得慢的马每天走150里，慢马先走12天，问快马几天可以追上慢马？
new_text: (Ancient Chinese problem): A fast horse runs 240 miles every day, while a slow horse runs 150 miles every day. The slow horse starts 12 days ahead. How many days will it take for the fast horse to catch up to the slow horse?

original_text: 2015年某市人均GDP约为2013年的1.21倍，如果该市每年的人家GDP增长率相同，那么增长率为多少？
new_text: The per capita GDP of a certain city in 2015 was approximately 1.21 times that of 2013. If the annual growth rate of the city's GDP per household remains the same, what is the growth rate?

original_text: 机械厂加工车间有85名工人，平均每人每天加工大齿轮16个或小齿轮10个，2个大齿轮和3个小齿轮配成1套，问需分别安排多少名工人加工大、小齿轮，才能使每天加工的大小齿轮刚好配套？
new_text: The mechanical factory's processing workshop has 85 workers. On average, each worker can process 16 large gears or 10 small gears per day. 2 large gears and 3 small gears make up a set. How many workers should be assigned to process the large and small gears respectively, in order to have a perfect match of gears processed each day?

original_text: 景山中学7年级开展演讲比赛，学校决定购买1些笔记本和钢笔作为奖品．现了解情况如下：甲、乙2家商店出售2种同样品牌的笔记本和钢笔．笔记本定价为每本20元，钢笔每支定价5元，经洽谈后，甲店每买1本笔记本赠1支钢笔；乙店全部按定价的0.9折优惠．7年级需笔记本20本，钢笔若干支（不小于20支）．当购买钢笔多少支时，在2店购买付款1样？
new_text: Jingshan Middle School is organizing a speech competition for 7th graders. The school has decided to purchase some notebooks and pens as prizes. The situation is as follows: There are two stores, Store A and Store B, selling two types of the same brand of notebooks and pens. The price of each notebook is 20 yuan, and each pen is priced at 5 yuan. After negotiations, Store A offers a free pen for every notebook purchased, while Store B offers a 10% discount on the total price. The 7th grade class needs 20 notebooks and at least 20 pens. How many pens should be purchased in order to pay the same amount at both stores?

original_text: 某车间共有90名工人，每名工人平均每天可加工甲种部件15个或乙种部件8个，应安排加工甲、乙2种部件各多少人，才能使每天加工后每3个甲种部件与2个乙种部件恰好配套？
new_text: In a certain workshop, there are a total of 90 workers. Each worker can process an average of 15 type A components or 8 type B components per day. How many workers should be assigned to process type A and type B components respectively, so that after processing each day, there will be an exact match of 3 type A components and 2 type B components?

original_text: 1家商店将某种服装按成本价提高40%后标价，又以0.8折（即按标价的80%）优惠卖出，结果每件作服装仍可获利15元，则这种服装每件的成本是多少元？
new_text: A store increases the price of a certain type of clothing by 40% based on the cost price, and then sells it at a discount of 20% off the marked price (which is 80% of the marked price). If the store still makes a profit of 15 yuan per item, what is the cost of each item of clothing?

original_text: 我国古代问题：以绳测井，若将绳0.3折测之，绳多4尺；若将绳0.4折测之，绳多1尺，绳长、井深各几何？（注：绳儿折即把绳平均分成几等分．）（）
new_text: Ancient problem in our country: Using a rope to measure the depth of a well. If the rope is folded 0.3 times, it is 4 feet longer. If the rope is folded 0.4 times, it is 1 foot longer. What is the length of the rope and the depth of the well? (Note: Folding the rope means dividing it into equal parts.) ( )

original_text: 小慧在1张日历的1横排上圈了连续的4个数，它们的和为22，这4个数中最小的为多少．
new_text: Xiao Hui circled four consecutive numbers in a row on one calendar. The sum of these four numbers is 22. What is the smallest number among these four numbers?

original_text: 根据国家“2免1补”政策，某地区2006年投入教育经费5000万元，预计2008年投入教育经费7200万元求这2年投入教育经费的年平均增长率．
new_text: According to the national "2 exemptions and 1 subsidy" policy, a certain region invested 50 million yuan in education in 2006. It is expected to invest 72 million yuan in education in 2008. Calculate the average annual growth rate of education expenditure over these 2 years.

original_text: 元旦来临，各大商场都设计了促进消费增加利润的促销措施，“物美”商场把1类2肩背的书包按进价提高50%进行标价，然后再打出0.8折的优惠价，这样商场每卖出1个书包就可盈利8元，这种书包的进价是多少元？
new_text: New Year's Day is approaching, and major shopping malls have designed promotional measures to increase consumption and profits. "Wumei" department store has priced a type 2-shoulder backpack at 50% above cost, and then offered a discount of 20% off. With this pricing strategy, the department store can make a profit of 8 yuan for each backpack sold. What is the cost price of this backpack?

original_text: 为迎接6月5日“世界环境日”，某校团委开展“光盘行动”，倡议学生遏制餐桌上的浪费．该校7年级（1）、（2）、（3）3个班共128人参加了活动，其中7（3）班有38人参加，7（1）班参加的人数7比（2）班多10人，请问7（1）班和7（2）班各有多少人参加“光盘行动”？
new_text: To celebrate "World Environment Day" on June 5th, the Student Union of a certain school launched the "Clean Plate Campaign" to encourage students to reduce food waste at the dining table. A total of 128 students from three classes in the 7th grade (1), (2), and (3) participated in the activity. Among them, 38 students from class 7 (3) participated, and class 7 (1) had 10 more participants than class 7 (2). How many students from class 7 (1) and class 7 (2) participated in the "Clean Plate Campaign"?

original_text: 打扫本班清洁区域卫生，1个人打扫需要30min完成，生活委员计划由1部分人先打扫5min，然后增加2人与他们1起打扫3min，完成打扫任务．假设同学们打扫清洁区域卫生的劳动效率相同，那么生活委员应先安排多少人打扫？
new_text: Clean the clean area of ​​this class, it takes 30 minutes for one person to complete the cleaning. The life committee plans for a group of people to clean for 5 minutes first, and then add 2 more people to clean with them for 3 minutes, completing the cleaning task. Assuming that the labor efficiency of the students cleaning the clean area is the same, how many people should the life committee arrange to clean first?

original_text: 育才中学8年级甲、乙2个班共104名同学游公园，其中甲班人数较少，不到50人，乙班人数较多，有50多人。经估算，如果2班都以班为单位分别购票，则1共应付1240元。公园的门票价格规定：购票人数1~50人每人门票价13元，购票人数51~100人每人门票价11元，购票人数100人以上每人门票价9元。分别求出甲、乙2班各有多少名学生。
new_text: 8th grade Class A and Class B of Yucai Middle School have a total of 104 students who went to the park. Class A has fewer than 50 students, while Class B has more than 50 students. Based on estimation, if both classes purchase tickets separately as a class, a total of 1240 yuan should be paid. The park's ticket prices are as follows: for a group of 1-50 people, the ticket price is 13 yuan per person; for a group of 51-100 people, the ticket price is 11 yuan per person; for a group of over 100 people, the ticket price is 9 yuan per person. Find out how many students are in Class A and Class B, respectively.

original_text: 为解决群众看病贵的问题，我市有关部门决定降低药价，对某种原价为289元的药品进行连续2次降价后为256元求平均每次降价的100分率
new_text: To solve the problem of expensive medical treatment for the masses, the relevant departments in our city have decided to lower drug prices. After two consecutive price reductions, a certain drug that originally cost 289 yuan is now priced at 256 yuan. Please calculate the average rate of each price reduction as a percentage.

original_text: 桌面上有甲、乙、丙3个圆柱形的杯子，杯深均为25公分，各装有15公分高的水，下表记录了甲、乙、丙3个杯子的底面积，甲杯：底面积（平方公分）：60；乙杯：底面积（平方公分）：80；丙杯：底面积（平方公分）：100；今小明将甲、乙2杯内1些水倒入丙杯，过程中水没溢出，使得甲、乙、丙3杯内水的高度比变为3：4：5．若不计杯子厚度，则丙杯内水的高度变为多少公分？
new_text: There are three cylindrical cups on the table, labeled A, B, and C. The depth of each cup is 25 cm, and they are each filled with water to a height of 15 cm. The table below records the base area of cups A, B, and C. Cup A: base area (in square cm): 60; Cup B: base area (in square cm): 80; Cup C: base area (in square cm): 100. Now, Xiao Ming pours some water from cups A and B into cup C, without overflowing the water. This causes the ratio of the water heights in cups A, B, and C to become 3:4:5. If we disregard the thickness of the cups, what is the new height of the water in cup C, in cm?

original_text: 1家商店将某种服装按成本价提高40%标价，又以0.8折优惠卖出，结果每件服装仍可获利15元，则这种服装每件的成本价是多少元？
new_text: A store increases the price of a certain type of clothing by 40% of the cost price, and then sells it with a discount of 20% off. As a result, each piece of clothing still earns a profit of 15 yuan. What is the cost price of each piece of clothing?

original_text: “水是生命之源”，市自来水公司为鼓励用户节约用水，按以下规定收取水费：用水量/月：不超过40吨的部分，单位（元/吨）：1；超过40吨的部分，单位（元/吨）：1.5；另：每吨用水加收0.2元的城市污水处理费若该用户2月份共交水费65元，问该用户2月份用水多少吨？
new_text: "Water is the source of life. In order to encourage water conservation, the municipal water company charges water fees according to the following regulations: for monthly water usage that does not exceed 40 tons, the rate is 1 yuan/ton; for the portion exceeding 40 tons, the rate is 1.5 yuan/ton. Additionally, there is a city sewage treatment fee of 0.2 yuan per ton of water used. If a user paid a total of 65 yuan for water fees in February, how many tons of water did the user use in February?"

original_text: 某班为了奖励在上学年期末考试成绩进步的同学，花了400元购买甲、乙2种奖品共30件，其中甲种奖品每件16元，乙种奖品每件12元．求甲、乙2种奖品各买多少件？
new_text: A certain class, in order to reward students who have made progress in their final exam scores in the previous school year, spent 400 yuan to purchase a total of 30 items of two types of prizes, A and B. Among them, each item of prize A costs 16 yuan, and each item of prize B costs 12 yuan. How many items of each type of prize, A and B, were purchased?

original_text: 在风速为24km/h的条件下，1架飞机顺风从A机场飞到B机场要用2h，它逆风飞行同样的航线要用3h，求：无风时这架飞机在这1航线的航速？
new_text: Under the condition of a wind speed of 24km/h, it takes 2 hours for an airplane to fly from Airport A to Airport B with the wind. It takes 3 hours for the same airplane to fly the same route against the wind. What is the airspeed of this airplane on this route with no wind?

original_text: 某商品原售价400元，连续2次降价后售价为324元，该商品平均降价的100分率为多少？
new_text: The original price of a certain product was 400 yuan. After two consecutive price reductions, the selling price became 324 yuan. What is the percentage of the average price reduction for this product?

original_text: 列方程或方程组解应用题：小明到学校的小卖部为班级运动会购买奖品，若购买4根荧光笔和8个笔记本需要100元，若购买8根荧光笔和4个笔记本需要80元，请问荧光笔和笔记本的单价各是多少元？
new_text: Equation or system of equations application problem: Xiao Ming went to the school's convenience store to buy prizes for the class sports meeting. If he buys 4 fluorescent pens and 8 notebooks, it costs 100 yuan. If he buys 8 fluorescent pens and 4 notebooks, it costs 80 yuan. What is the price of each fluorescent pen and notebook?

original_text: 如图是2016年1月份的日历，在日历上任意圈出1个竖列上相邻的3个数．如果被圈出的3个数的和为54，则这3个数中最大的1个数是多少？
new_text:
The following is the translation of the Chinese text to English:

The picture shows the calendar for January 2016. Circle any three adjacent numbers in a vertical column on the calendar. If the sum of the circled numbers is 54, what is the largest number among these three numbers?

original_text: 统计数据显示，在我国的664座城市中，按水资源情况可分为3类：暂不缺水城市、1般缺水城市和严重缺水城市．其中，暂不缺水城市数比严重缺水城市数的3倍多52座，1般缺水城市数是严重缺水城市数的2倍．求严重缺水城市有多少座？
new_text:
The translation of the Chinese text is as follows:

"According to statistical data, among the 664 cities in our country, they can be divided into three categories based on the water resources situation: cities that are not currently experiencing water shortage, cities with moderate water shortage, and cities with severe water shortage. Among them, there are 52 cities that are not currently experiencing water shortage, which is more than three times the number of cities with severe water shortage. The number of cities with moderate water shortage is twice the number of cities with severe water shortage. How many cities are experiencing severe water shortage?"

original_text: 夏季来临，某超市试销A、B2种型号的风扇，2周内共销售30台，销售收入5300元，A型风扇每台200元，B型风扇每台150元，问A、B2种型号的风扇分别销售了多少台？若设A型风扇销售了x台，B型风扇销售了y台，求x和y的值。
new_text: Summer is coming, and a supermarket is testing the sales of two models of fans, A and B. Within 2 weeks, a total of 30 fans were sold, generating a sales revenue of 5300 yuan. The price of each A model fan is 200 yuan, and the price of each B model fan is 150 yuan. The question asks how many fans of each model, A and B, were sold. Let's assume that x represents the number of A model fans sold, and y represents the number of B model fans sold. We need to find the values of x and y.

original_text: “100重”、“沃尔玛”2家超市出售同样的保温壶和水杯，保温壶和水杯在2家超市的售价分别1样已知买1个保温壶和1个水杯要花费60元，买2个保温壶和3个水杯要花费130元．请问：1个保温壶与1个水杯售价各是多少元？
new_text: "100 Chong" and "Walmart" are two supermarkets that sell the same thermos and water cups. The prices of the thermos and water cups in the two supermarkets are known to be the same. It is known that buying one thermos and one water cup costs 60 yuan, and buying two thermos and three water cups costs 130 yuan. So, what is the price of one thermos and one water cup each?

original_text: 甲、乙两人相距50千米，若同向而行，乙10小时可追上甲；若相向而行，2小时2人相遇．求甲、乙两人每小时分别走多少千米？
new_text: Person A and person B are 50 kilometers apart. If they travel in the same direction, person B can catch up to person A in 10 hours. If they travel towards each other, they meet in 2 hours. What is the distance each person travels per hour?

original_text: 某同学在A、B2家超市发现他看中的随身听的单价相同，书包的单价也相同。随身听和书包单价之和是452元，且随身听的单价是书包单价的4倍少8元。求该同学看中的随身听和书包的单价各是多少元？
new_text: A classmate found that the price of the portable cassette player he liked was the same at both supermarket A and supermarket B2. The price of the backpack was also the same. The sum of the prices of the portable cassette player and the backpack was 452 yuan, and the price of the portable cassette player was 4 times the price of the backpack minus 8 yuan. What are the prices of the portable cassette player and the backpack that the classmate liked?

original_text: 若矩形的长是6cm，宽为3cm，1个正方形的面积等于该矩形的面积，则正方形的边长是多少cm？
new_text: If the length of a rectangle is 6cm and the width is 3cm, and the area of one square is equal to the area of the rectangle, what is the length of the square in cm?

original_text: 制造1种产品，原来每件的成本是300元，由于连续2次降低成本，现在每件的成本是192元．若2次降低成本的100分率相同．求平均每次降低成本的100分率．
new_text:
Translate the following Chinese text to English: 

"Manufacture a product, originally costing 300 yuan per unit. Due to two consecutive cost reductions, the current cost per unit is 192 yuan. If the percentage reduction in cost for both instances is the same, calculate the average percentage reduction in cost per instance."

original_text: 水果店张阿姨以每斤2元的价格购进某种水果若干斤，然后以每斤4元的价格出售，每天可售出100斤．通过调查发现，这种水果每斤的售价每降低1元，每天可多售出200斤．为了保证每天至少售出260斤张阿姨决定降价销售．销售这种水果要想每天盈利300元，张阿姨需将每斤的售价降低多少元？
new_text: Aunt Zhang, the owner of a fruit store, purchases a certain amount of fruit at a price of 2 yuan per kilogram, and then sells it at a price of 4 yuan per kilogram. She can sell 100 kilograms per day. Through investigation, it was found that for every 1 yuan decrease in the selling price per kilogram, an additional 200 kilograms can be sold per day. In order to ensure a minimum daily sales of 260 kilograms, Aunt Zhang decides to reduce the selling price. To make a profit of 300 yuan per day from selling this fruit, how much should Aunt Zhang reduce the selling price per kilogram?

original_text: 用12m长的1根铁丝围成长方形．若长方形的面积为8m^2，则此时长方形的长是多少？
new_text: Using a 12m long iron wire to form a rectangle. If the area of the rectangle is 8m^2, what is the length of the rectangle?

original_text: 某品牌专卖店对畅销的A款取暖器进行促销，已知每台A款取暖器的进价是800元，标价是1200元．该店上周共售出A款取暖器100台，本周A款取暖器每台在标价的基础上降价1/3x%，结果本周售出的A款取暖器的数量比上周售出的A款取暖器的数量增加了5/2x%，且本周销售A款取暖器的利润达到了40000元，求x的值．
new_text: A certain brand's specialty store is promoting the popular A-type heater. It is known that the cost price of each A-type heater is 800 yuan, and the listed price is 1200 yuan. Last week, the store sold a total of 100 A-type heaters. This week, the price of each A-type heater was reduced by 1/3x% based on the listed price. As a result, the number of A-type heaters sold this week increased by 5/2x% compared to last week, and the profit from selling A-type heaters this week reached 40,000 yuan. Find the value of x.

original_text: 2013年，我市某楼盘以每平方米6500元的均价对外销售因为楼盘滞销，房地产开发商为了加快资金周转，决定进行降价促销，经过连续2年下调后，2015年的均价为每平方米5265元．求平均每年下调的100分率
new_text: In 2013, a certain real estate project in our city was sold to the public at an average price of 6500 yuan per square meter. Due to poor sales, the real estate developer decided to lower the price to speed up capital turnover. After continuous price reductions for 2 years, the average price in 2015 was 5265 yuan per square meter. Calculate the average annual rate of decrease.

original_text: 饲养8匹马和15头牛每天要喂162kg干草，已知5匹马每天所吃的干草比7头牛每天吃的多3kg，每天喂1匹马和1头牛的干草各是多少？
new_text: To feed 8 horses and 15 cows, 162kg of hay is needed every day. It is known that 5 horses eat 3kg more hay per day than 7 cows. How much hay is fed to 1 horse and 1 cow each day?

original_text: 甲、乙2件服装的成本价共500元，商店老板为获取利润，决定将甲服装按50%的利润定价，乙服装按60%的利润定价，在实际出售时，应顾客要求，2件服装均按0.8折出售，这样商店共获利120元，求甲、乙2件服装的成本是多少元．
new_text: The cost price of two clothing items, A and B, is a total of 500 yuan. In order to make a profit, the store owner decides to price clothing item A with a 50% profit margin and clothing item B with a 60% profit margin. When actually sold, both clothing items are sold at a discount of 20% as requested by the customers. With this, the store makes a total profit of 120 yuan. The question is asking for the cost price of clothing items A and B.

original_text: 某公司2018年获利润1000万元，计划到2020年年利润达到1210万元设该公司的年利润平均增长率为x，则x的值为多少？
new_text: A certain company made a profit of 10 million yuan in 2018 and plans to achieve a profit of 12.1 million yuan by the year 2020. If the average annual growth rate of the company's profit is denoted as x, what is the value of x?

original_text: 在1次商品交易会上，参加交易会的每2家公司之间都要签订1份合同，会议结束后共签订了78份合同，问有多少家公司出席了这次交易会
new_text: At a trade fair, each pair of companies participating in the fair signed one contract. After the meeting, a total of 78 contracts were signed. How many companies attended the trade fair?

original_text: 毕节市为加快新农村建设，建设美丽乡村，对A、B2类村庄进行了全面改建．根据预算，建设1个A类美丽村庄和1个B类美丽村庄共需资金270万元；织金县建设了2个A类村庄和5个B类村庄共投入资金1020万元．建设1个A类美丽村庄和1个B类美丽村庄所需的资金分别是多少万元？
new_text:
The text translates to:

"In order to accelerate the construction of new rural areas and build beautiful countryside, Bijie City has comprehensively renovated Class A and Class B2 villages. According to the budget, it requires a total of 2.7 million yuan to build one Class A beautiful village and one Class B beautiful village. Zijin County has invested a total of 10.2 million yuan to build two Class A villages and five Class B villages. How much funding is needed to build one Class A beautiful village and one Class B beautiful village respectively?"

original_text: 某公司的门票价格规定如下:购票人数1~50人票价为13元；购票人数51~100人票价为11元；购票人数在100人以上则票价为9元。某校7年级（1），（2）2个班共104人去游公园，其中（1）班人数较少，不到50人，（2）班人数较多，有50多人．经估算，如果2班都以班为单位分别购票，则1共应付1240元；（1）2班各有多少名学生？
new_text: The ticket price regulations of a certain company are as follows: The ticket price for a group of 1-50 people is 13 yuan; the ticket price for a group of 51-100 people is 11 yuan; and the ticket price for a group of over 100 people is 9 yuan. A total of 104 students from two classes, (1) and (2), of grade 7 in a certain school went to the park. The number of students in class (1) is less than 50, and the number of students in class (2) is more than 50. According to estimation, if both classes purchase tickets separately as a class, a total of 1240 yuan should be paid. How many students are there in each class?

original_text: 1个书架宽88cm，某1层上摆满了第一册的数学书和语文书，共90本，小丽量得1本数学书厚0.8cm，1本语文书厚1.2cm，求这层书架上语文书的本数．
new_text: A bookshelf is 88cm wide. On a certain level, it is filled with the first volume of math and Chinese books, totaling 90 books. Xiaoli measured that one math book is 0.8cm thick and one Chinese book is 1.2cm thick. Find the number of Chinese books on this level of the bookshelf.

original_text: 某商店将进价为8元的商品按每件10元售出，每天可售出200件，现在采取提高商品售价减少销售量的办法增加利润，如果这种商品每件的销售价每提高0.5元其销售量就减少10件，问应将每件售价定为多少元时，才能使每天利润为640元？
new_text: A certain store sells goods that cost 8 yuan to purchase for 10 yuan each. They are able to sell 200 pieces per day. Now, they want to increase their profit by raising the selling price of the goods and reducing the sales volume. If for every 0.5 yuan increase in the selling price, the sales volume decreases by 10 pieces, what should be the selling price per piece in order to achieve a daily profit of 640 yuan?

original_text: 1棉花种植区的农民研制出采摘棉花的单人便携式采棉机，效率高，能耗低．经测试，1个人操作该采棉机的采摘效率为35公斤/时，大约是1个人工采摘的3.5倍．雇人采摘棉花，无论手工还是机器采摘，均按每采摘1公斤棉花1.5元的标准支付雇工工资，雇工每天工作8小时．老王家经测算，收购完全部棉花需出资24000元雇佣10人用8天时间，那么他应雇佣操作采棉机多少人？
new_text: The farmers in the cotton planting area have developed a single-person portable cotton picking machine with high efficiency and low energy consumption. According to tests, the picking efficiency of one person operating this cotton picking machine is 35 kilograms per hour, which is approximately 3.5 times that of manual picking by one person. Whether picking cotton by hand or by machine, the wage for hired workers is 1.5 yuan per kilogram of cotton picked, and the workers work 8 hours a day. Mr. Wang's family has calculated that it would cost 24,000 yuan to hire 10 people for 8 days to purchase all the cotton. How many people should he hire to operate the cotton picking machine?

original_text: 1艘船从甲码头到乙码头顺流行驶，用了4小时；从乙码头返回甲码头逆流行驶，用了5小时．已知船在静水中的平均速度是27千米/时．求水流速度．
new_text: A boat traveled downstream from Pier A to Pier B and took 4 hours. It then traveled upstream from Pier B back to Pier A and took 5 hours. It is known that the average speed of the boat in still water is 27 kilometers per hour. Find the speed of the water current.

original_text: 新华书店把1本新书按标价的0.8折出售，仍可获利20%，若该书的进价为20元，则标价为多少元？
new_text: The Xinhua Bookstore sells a new book at a discount of 0.8 times the marked price, still making a profit of 20%. If the cost price of the book is 20 yuan, what is the marked price?

original_text: 下面是同学们玩过的“锤子、剪刀、布”的游戏规则，游戏在2位同学中间进行，我们约定：“布”赢“锤子”得5分，“锤子”赢“剪刀”得4分，“剪刀”赢“布”得3分．小华和小军在玩游戏，小华赢了10次，得38分，其中“剪刀”赢“布”5次，聪明的你能否求出小华“布”赢“锤子”多少次？
new_text:
Here is the translation of the Chinese text to English:

"The following are the rules of the game 'Rock, Paper, Scissors' that the students have played. The game is played between two students. We have agreed that 'Paper' wins against 'Rock' and earns 5 points, 'Rock' wins against 'Scissors' and earns 4 points, and 'Scissors' wins against 'Paper' and earns 3 points. Xiao Hua and Xiao Jun are playing the game. Xiao Hua has won 10 times and earned 38 points. Among those wins, 'Scissors' has won against 'Paper' 5 times. Can you cleverly figure out how many times Xiao Hua's 'Paper' has won against 'Rock'?"

original_text: 某蔬菜经营户，用160元从某蔬菜市场批发了茄子和豆角共50千克，茄子、豆角当天的批发价和0售价如下表所示：品名：茄子：批发价（元/千克）：3.0，0售价（元/千克）：4.5；豆角：批发价（元/千克）：3.5，0售价（元/千克）：5.2；这天该经营户批发了茄子多少千克？
new_text:
A vegetable vendor purchased eggplants and green beans from a vegetable market for a total of 50 kilograms, spending 160 yuan. The wholesale and retail prices for eggplants and green beans on that day are as follows: 
- Eggplant: Wholesale price (yuan/kg): 3.0, Retail price (yuan/kg): 4.5 
- Green beans: Wholesale price (yuan/kg): 3.5, Retail price (yuan/kg): 5.2 
How many kilograms of eggplants did the vendor wholesale on that day?

original_text: 某粮食生产专业户去年计划生产水稻和小麦共15吨，实际生产了17吨，其中水稻超产15%，小麦超产10%，该专业户去年实际生产小麦、水稻各多少吨？
new_text: A certain professional household engaged in grain production planned to produce a total of 15 tons of rice and wheat last year. However, they actually produced 17 tons, with a 15% increase in rice production and a 10% increase in wheat production. How many tons of wheat and rice did this professional household actually produce last year?

original_text: 1次会议上，每2个参加会议的人都相互握1次手，1共握手45次，则参加会议的人数是多少？
new_text: At a meeting, each person shakes hands with every other person once. There are a total of 45 handshakes. How many people attended the meeting?

original_text: 为保护生态环境，陕西省某县响应国家“退耕还林”号召，将某1部分耕地改为林地，改变后，林地面积和耕地面积共有180平方千米，耕地面积是林地面积的25%，为求改变后林地面积和耕地面积各多少平方千米？
new_text: To protect the ecological environment, a certain county in Shaanxi Province responded to the national call for "returning farmland to forests" by converting a portion of cultivated land into forest land. After the conversion, the total area of forest land and cultivated land is 180 square kilometers. The area of cultivated land is 25% of the area of forest land. What are the respective areas of forest land and cultivated land after the change?

original_text: 某电脑销售商试销1某品牌电脑以4000元/台销售时，平均每月可销售100台，现为了扩大销售，销售商决定降价销售，在原来1月份平均销售量的基础上，经2月份的市场调查，3月份调整价格后，月销售额达到576000元．已知电脑价格每台下降10元，月销售量将上升1台．求1月份到3月份销售额的月平均增长率．
new_text: A certain computer retailer conducted a trial sale of a certain brand of computers at a price of 4000 yuan per unit. On average, they were able to sell 100 units per month. In order to expand sales, the retailer decided to lower the price. Based on the average sales volume in January, after conducting market research in February and adjusting the price in March, the monthly sales reached 576,000 yuan. It is known that for every 10 yuan decrease in the price of the computers, the monthly sales volume will increase by 1 unit. The average monthly growth rate of sales from January to March is required.

original_text: 在1张长40cm，宽25cm的长方形硬纸片，裁去角上4个小正方形之后，折成无盖纸盒，若纸盒的底面积是450cm^2，则纸盒的高是多少？
new_text: After cutting off 4 small squares from the corners of a rectangular cardboard measuring 40cm in length and 25cm in width, folding it into a lidless paper box, if the base area of the paper box is 450cm^2, what is the height of the paper box?

original_text: 星辰中学计划租用若干辆汽车运送7年级学生外出进行研学活动，如果1辆车乘坐45人，那么有35名学生没有车坐；如果1辆车乘坐60人，那么有1辆车只坐了35人，并且还空出1辆车求计划租用多少辆车，共有多少名学？
new_text:
The translation of the Chinese text is as follows:

"Xingchen Middle School plans to rent several cars to transport 7th grade students for outdoor study activities. If each car can accommodate 45 people, then there will be 35 students without a seat. If each car can accommodate 60 people, then one car will only have 35 people, and there will be one car left empty. How many cars should be rented for the plan, and how many students are there in total?"

original_text: 白溪镇2013年有绿地面积57.5公顷，该镇近几年不断增加绿地面积，2015年达到82.8公顷．求该镇2013至2015年绿地面积的年平均增长率．
new_text:
The English translation of the Chinese text is as follows:

"In 2013, Baixi Town had a green area of 57.5 hectares. The town has continuously increased its green area in recent years, reaching 82.8 hectares in 2015. Calculate the annual average growth rate of the green area in Baixi Town from 2013 to 2015."

original_text: 开学初，小芳和小亮去学校商店购买学习用品，小芳用17元钱买了1支钢笔和3本笔记本；小亮用31元买了同样的钢笔2支和笔记本5本求每支钢笔和每本笔记本的价格．
new_text: At the beginning of the school year, Xiaofang and Xiaoliang went to the school store to buy school supplies. Xiaofang bought 1 pen and 3 notebooks for 17 yuan. Xiaoliang bought 2 pens and 5 notebooks for 31 yuan. Find the price of each pen and each notebook.

original_text: 我国古代数学名著《孙子算经》中记载了1道题，大意是：100匹马恰好拉了100片瓦，已知1匹大马能拉3片瓦，3匹小马能拉1片瓦，问有多少匹大马、多少匹小马？问有多少匹大马、多少匹小马？若设大马有x匹，小马有y匹，求x和y的值。
new_text: The ancient Chinese mathematical masterpiece "Sunzi's Arithmetic Classic" records a problem as follows: 100 horses pulled exactly 100 tiles. It is known that one big horse can pull 3 tiles, and three small horses can pull 1 tile. The question is, how many big horses and how many small horses are there? If we assume there are x big horses and y small horses, we need to find the values of x and y.

original_text: 某镇2014年有绿地面积50公顷，该镇近几年不断增加绿地面2016年达到72公顷，则该镇2014年至2016年绿地面积的年平均增长率是多少？
new_text: In 2014, a certain town had a green area of 50 hectares. In the following years, the green area of the town continued to increase, reaching 72 hectares in 2016. What is the average annual growth rate of the green area in the town from 2014 to 2016?

original_text: 1张试卷1共只有25道选择题，做对1题得4分，做错1题倒扣2分，李明同学做完全部试题，得了88分，那么他分别做对、做错了多少题？
new_text:
The text translates to: 

"There is only one paper with a total of 25 multiple-choice questions. Each correct answer is worth 4 points, and each wrong answer deducts 2 points. Li Ming finished all the test questions and scored 88 points. So, how many questions did he answer correctly and incorrectly respectively?"

original_text: 小明在学习之余去买文具，打算购买5支单价相同的签字笔和3本单价相同的笔记本，期间他与售货员对话如下:小明：你好，我要买5支签字笔和3本笔记本。售货员：好的，那你应该付52元。小明：刚才我把2种文具的价格弄反了，以为要付44元。求未弄反的签字笔和笔记本单价。
new_text:
Xiao Ming went to buy stationery while studying. He planned to buy 5 pens with the same unit price and 3 notebooks with the same unit price. During the process, he had the following conversation with the salesperson:

Xiao Ming: Hello, I want to buy 5 pens and 3 notebooks.
Salesperson: Alright, then you should pay 52 yuan.
Xiao Ming: I just mixed up the prices of the two types of stationery earlier, thinking that I had to pay 44 yuan. What is the unit price of the pens and notebooks before I mixed them up?

original_text: 由甲地到乙地前32分之的路是高速公路，后31分之的路是普通公路，高速公路和普通公路交界处是丙地．A车在高速公路和普通公路的行驶速度都是80千米/时；B车在高速公路上的行驶速度是100千米/时，在普通公路上的行驶速度是70千米/时，A，B2车分别从甲、乙2地同时出发相向行驶，在高速公路上距离丙地40千米处相遇，求甲、乙2地之间的距离是多少？
new_text: The distance between location A and location B is divided into two parts. The first 32/63 of the distance is a highway, and the remaining 31/63 of the distance is a normal road. The intersection between the highway and the normal road is location C. Car A and car B both travel at a speed of 80 kilometers per hour on the highway and the normal road. Car B travels at a speed of 100 kilometers per hour on the highway and 70 kilometers per hour on the normal road. Car A and car B start from locations A and B respectively at the same time and travel towards each other. They meet at a point 40 kilometers away from location C on the highway. The question is asking for the distance between locations A and B.

original_text: “埃博拉”病毒是1种能引起人类和灵长类动物产生“出血热”的烈性传染病毒，传染性极强，1日本游客在非洲旅游时不慎感染了“埃博拉”病毒，经过2轮传染后，共有81人受到感染，问每轮传染中平均1个人传染了几个人？
new_text: "The Ebola virus is a highly contagious infectious virus that can cause humans and primates to develop 'hemorrhagic fever'. During a trip to Africa, a Japanese tourist accidentally contracted the Ebola virus. After two rounds of transmission, a total of 81 people were infected. How many people, on average, were infected by one person in each round of transmission?"

original_text: 某种商品的标价为120元，若以0.9折降价出售，相对于进价仍获得20%，则该商品的进价是多少元？
new_text: The price of a certain product is 120 yuan. If it is sold at a discount of 0.9, and still obtains a profit of 20% relative to the cost price, what is the cost price of the product?

original_text: 1快餐店试销某种套餐，试销1段时间后发现，每份套餐的成本为5元，该店每天固定支出费用为600元(不含套餐成本)．若每份售价不超过10元，每天可销售400份；若每份售价超过10元，每提高1元，每天的销售量就减少40份．若该店日净收入为1560元，那么每份售价是多少元？(日净收入=每天的销售额-套餐成本-每天固定支出)
new_text: A fast food restaurant is testing the sales of a certain combo meal. After a period of testing, it is found that the cost of each combo meal is 5 yuan. The restaurant has a fixed daily expenditure of 600 yuan (excluding the cost of the combo meal). If the selling price of each combo meal does not exceed 10 yuan, the restaurant can sell 400 combo meals per day. If the selling price exceeds 10 yuan, for every 1 yuan increase, the daily sales volume decreases by 40 combo meals. If the daily net income of the restaurant is 1560 yuan, what is the selling price of each combo meal? (Daily net income = daily sales revenue - cost of combo meals - daily fixed expenditure)

original_text: 小红在某月日历的1个竖列上圈了3个数，这3个数的和恰好是33，则这3个数中最大的1个是多少．
new_text: Little Red circled 3 numbers in one vertical column of a certain month's calendar. The sum of these 3 numbers is exactly 33. What is the largest number among these 3 numbers?

original_text: 有大小2种货车，2辆大货车与3辆小货车1次可以运货15.5吨，5辆大货车与6辆小货车1次可以运货35吨1辆大货车1次可以运货多少吨，1辆小货车1次可以运货多少吨？
new_text: There are two types of trucks, big and small. Two big trucks and three small trucks can transport 15.5 tons at once. Five big trucks and six small trucks can transport 35 tons at once. How many tons can one big truck transport at once? How many tons can one small truck transport at once?

original_text: 刘俊问王老师的年龄时，王老师说：“我像你这么大时，你才3岁；等你到了我这么大时，我就45岁了．”问王老师今年多少岁？
new_text: When Liu Jun asked Teacher Wang about his age, Teacher Wang said, "When I was as old as you, you were only 3 years old; when you reach my age, I will be 45 years old." How old is Teacher Wang this year?

original_text: 在今年某月的日历中，用正方形方框圈出的4个数之和是48，则这4个数中最大的1个数是？
new_text: In a calendar for a certain month this year, if the sum of four numbers circled in square boxes is 48, then what is the largest number among these four numbers?

original_text: 某水果批发市场香蕉的价格如表:购买香蕉数（千克）:不超过20千克每千克的价格:6元20千克以上但不超过40千克每千克的价格:5元40千克以上每千克的价格:4元（1）李明分2次购买40千克，第二次购买的数量多于第一次购买的数量，共付出216元，第二次购买多少千克？
new_text:
The price of bananas in a certain fruit wholesale market is as follows: 
- For purchasing less than or equal to 20 kilograms of bananas, the price per kilogram is 6 yuan. 
- For purchasing more than 20 kilograms but less than or equal to 40 kilograms of bananas, the price per kilogram is 5 yuan. 
- For purchasing more than 40 kilograms of bananas, the price per kilogram is 4 yuan. 

(1) Li Ming purchased 40 kilograms of bananas in two separate transactions. The quantity purchased in the second transaction was greater than the quantity purchased in the first transaction. In total, Li Ming paid 216 yuan. How many kilograms did Li Ming purchase in the second transaction?

original_text: 1家商店某种衣服按进价提高50%后标价，又以0.8折优惠卖出，结果每件衣服获利100元，则这件衣服的进价是多少元？
new_text:
Translate the following Chinese text to English: 

A certain type of clothing in a store is marked up by 50% of the cost price, and then sold with a discount of 20% off. If each piece of clothing makes a profit of 100 yuan, what is the cost price of this piece of clothing?

original_text: 某校计划修建1个长方形花坛，要求花坛的长与宽的比为2：1，花坛中间为花卉种植区域，花卉种植区域前侧(与宽平行)留有2米宽的空地，其它3侧各保留1米宽的通道，如果要求花卉种植区域的面积是55平方米，那么整个花坛的宽为多少米？
new_text: A certain school plans to build a rectangular flower bed. The requirement is that the ratio of the length to the width of the flower bed is 2:1. The middle of the flower bed is the planting area for flowers. There is a 2-meter wide space in front of the planting area (parallel to the width), and 1-meter wide pathways are reserved on the other three sides. If the area of the planting area is required to be 55 square meters, what is the width of the entire flower bed in meters?

original_text: 某市电解金属锰厂从今年元月起安装了使用回收净化设备(安装时间不计)，这样既保护环境，又节省原料成本，据统计使用回收净化设备后1～x月的利润的月平均值W(万元)满足W=10x+90．请问多少个月后的利润和为1620万元？
new_text: A certain city's electrolytic manganese plant installed recycling and purification equipment starting from January this year (installation time not counted). This not only protects the environment but also saves raw material costs. According to statistics, the monthly average profit (in ten thousand yuan) after using the recycling and purification equipment for 1 to x months satisfies the equation W = 10x + 90. How many months will it take for the total profit to reach 1620 ten thousand yuan?

original_text: 表中是“深圳市路边临时停车位使用费收费标准”，深圳市路边临时停车车位使用费收费标准：工作日白天：1类区域：首半小时：5，首半小时后：10，2类区域：首半小时：2，首半小时后：6，3类区域：首半小时：2，首半小时后：4；非工作日（7：30～21：00）：1类区域：首半小时：2，首半小时后：4，2类区域：首半小时：1.5，首半小时后：2.5，3类区域：首半小时：1，首半小时后：1.5；晚上（21：00～次日7：30）：免费上6周上午9：00，小亮妈妈把车停在深圳中心书城路边临时停车位（属1类区域）．离开时，她发现共需要缴纳停车费30元，则她停车的时间是多少小时？
new_text:
The text is a description of the "Charging Standards for Temporary Parking Space Usage Fees in Shenzhen City". The charging standards for temporary parking space usage fees in Shenzhen City are as follows:

Weekdays during the day:
- Category 1 area: First half hour: 5 yuan, after the first half hour: 10 yuan
- Category 2 area: First half hour: 2 yuan, after the first half hour: 6 yuan
- Category 3 area: First half hour: 2 yuan, after the first half hour: 4 yuan

Non-working days (7:30-21:00):
- Category 1 area: First half hour: 2 yuan, after the first half hour: 4 yuan
- Category 2 area: First half hour: 1.5 yuan, after the first half hour: 2.5 yuan
- Category 3 area: First half hour: 1 yuan, after the first half hour: 1.5 yuan

Nighttime (21:00-7:30 the next day):
- Free until 9:00 the next morning
- If the car is parked in a temporary parking space on the roadside of Shenzhen Central Book City (Category 1 area), and the total parking fee is 30 yuan, the question asks for the duration of her parking time.

original_text: 某车间有60名工人，生产1种螺栓和螺帽，平均每人每小时生产螺栓15个或螺帽10个，应分配多少人生产螺栓，才能刚好配套？（每个螺栓配2个螺帽）
new_text: In a certain workshop, there are 60 workers who produce a type of bolts and nuts. On average, each person can produce 15 bolts or 10 nuts per hour. How many workers should be assigned to produce bolts in order to have a perfect match? (Each bolt requires 2 nuts)

original_text: 在2008年11黄金周期间，A超市和B超市都进行了让利销售活动（2个超市的商品标价都相同）．A超市的促销方法是所购商品总价在200元以内打0.9折，超出200元的部分打0.8折；B超市的促销方法是所有商品1分律打0.85折．她要购买原价为多少元的商品时（只考虑优惠，不考虑其他因素的影响），去A超市和B超市1样？
new_text: During the 2008 Golden Week, both A supermarket and B supermarket conducted promotional sales activities (the prices of goods in both supermarkets were the same). A supermarket's promotion method was to give a 10% discount for the total price of purchased goods under 200 yuan, and an 20% discount for the portion exceeding 200 yuan. original_text: 1个2位数的10位数字与个位数字的和是8，把这个2位数加上18，结果恰好成为数字对调后组成的2位数，求这个2位数的10位数字与个位数字．

original_text: 节约用水，人人有责，某市为了鼓励居民节约用水，对自来水用户按如下标准收费：若每月每户用水不超过12吨，按每吨y元收费；若超过12吨，则超过部分按每吨2y元收费．如果小聪家6月份缴纳水费20y元，求小聪家这个月的实际用水量．

original_text: 盘秤是1种常见的称量工具，指针转过的角度与被称物体的重量有1定的关系，如表所示：重量（单位：千克）：0，指针转过的角度：0°；重量（单位：千克）：2，指针转过的角度：36°；重量（单位：千克）：2.5，指针转过的角度：a°；重量（单位：千克）：3，指针转过的角度：54°；重量（单位：千克）：b，指针转过的角度：180°；指针转过的角度不得超过360°，否则盘秤会受捆，某顾客在1家水果店购买水果，用这种盘秤称量2次，第二次的数量是第一次数量的2倍少3千克，且指针第二次转过的角度比第一次大108°，该顾客第一次购买了多少千克水果．
new_text:
The balance scale is a common weighing tool, and the angle the pointer turns is related to the weight of the object being weighed. The table below shows the relationship:

Weight (unit: kilograms): 0, Angle of pointer: 0°
Weight (unit: kilograms): 2, Angle of pointer: 36°
Weight (unit: kilograms): 2.5, Angle of pointer: a°
Weight (unit: kilograms): 3, Angle of pointer: 54°
Weight (unit: kilograms): b, Angle of pointer: 180°

The angle of the pointer must not exceed 360°, otherwise the balance scale will be damaged. A customer bought fruit from a fruit store and used this type of balance scale to weigh it twice. The quantity of the second purchase was 2 times less 3 kilograms compared to the first purchase, and the angle of the pointer in the second purchase was 108° greater than the first purchase. How many kilograms of fruit did the customer buy for the first time?

original_text: 某商场用2730元购进A、B2种新型节能日光灯共60盏，这2种日光灯的进价、标价如下表所示：A型，进价：35元/盏，标价：50元/盏；B型，进价：65元/盏，标价：100元/盏；A型日光灯购进多少盏？
new_text:
A certain shopping mall purchased a total of 60 new energy-saving fluorescent lamps of types A and B2 for a total cost of 2730 yuan. The purchase price and the selling price of these two types of fluorescent lamps are shown in the table below: 
Type A: Purchase price: 35 yuan/lamp, Selling price: 50 yuan/lamp 
Type B: Purchase price: 65 yuan/lamp, Selling price: 100 yuan/lamp 
How many lamps of type A were purchased?

original_text: 我省某地生产的1种绿色蔬菜，在市场上若直接销售，每吨利润为1000元，经粗加工后销售，每吨利润可达4500元，经精加工后销售，每吨利润涨至7500元．当地1家农工商公司收获这种蔬菜140吨该公司加工厂的生产能力是：如果对蔬菜进行粗加工，每天可加工16吨；如果进行精加工，每天可加工6吨，但2种加工方式不能同时进行受季节等条件限制，公司必须用15天的时间将这批蔬菜全部销售或加工完毕求15天内精加工和粗加工蔬菜各为多少吨。
new_text:
The translation of the Chinese text is as follows:

A type of green vegetable produced in a certain place in our province has a profit of 1000 yuan per ton if sold directly in the market. After rough processing, the profit can reach 4500 yuan per ton. After fine processing, the profit increases to 7500 yuan per ton. A local agricultural and commercial company harvested 140 tons of this vegetable. The production capacity of the company's processing plant is as follows: if the vegetable is roughly processed, it can process 16 tons per day; if it is finely processed, it can process 6 tons per day. However, the two processing methods cannot be carried out simultaneously due to seasonal and other conditions. The company must sell or process all these vegetables within 15 days. Please calculate how many tons of vegetables should be finely processed and roughly processed within 15 days.

Xiaofang: "Yesterday, the 8th-grade teachers and students from our school rented 4 60-seat buses and 2 45-seat buses from this passenger transport company to visit Shaoshan. The total rental cost for one day was 5000 yuan."

Xiaoming: "The 9th-grade teachers and students rented 5 60-seat buses and 1 45-seat bus, which were exactly enough to accommodate everyone."

original_text: 某超市销售1种饮料，平均每天可售出100箱，每箱利润120元．天气渐热，为了扩大销售，增加利润，超市准备适当降价．据测算，若每箱饮料每降价1元，每天可多售出2箱．在要求每箱饮料获利大于80元的情况下，要使每天销售饮料获利14400元，问每箱应降价多少元？

original_text: 公民每月工资、薪金等个人收入所得不超过3000元的不必纳税，超过3000元的部分为全月应纳税所得额，此项税款按下面分段累加计算：不超过500元的部分交5%的税；超过500元且低于2000元的部分交纳10%税；超过2000元且低于5000元的部分交15%税；超过5000元的部分交20%税．若小张某个月个人收入交325元税，则小张该月个人收入为多少元？
new_text:
The translation of the Chinese text is as follows:

If Mr. Zhang pays 325 yuan in taxes on his personal income for a certain month, how much is his personal income for that month?"

original_text: 威海某旅行社组团去泰山旅游，推出了如下收费标准；如果人数不超过25人，每人团费800元；如果超过25人，每超过1人，每人团费降低10元，但每人团费不低于550元．某单位组织员工参加，共支付给旅行社旅游费用27000元，请问该单位共有多少名员工去泰山旅游？
new_text:
A travel agency in Weihai organized a group tour to Mount Tai and introduced the following charging standards: If the number of people does not exceed 25, the group fee is 800 yuan per person. If it exceeds 25 people, for each additional person, the group fee is reduced by 10 yuan, but the group fee per person is not less than 550 yuan. An organization organized its employees to participate and paid a total of 27,000 yuan to the travel agency for the tour. How many employees from that organization went to Mount Tai?

To solve this problem, we can start by assuming the number of employees who went to Mount Tai is x. 

If the number of employees is not more than 25, the group fee per person is 800 yuan. So, the total fee for x employees would be 800x yuan.

If the number of employees is more than 25, for each additional person, the group fee is reduced by 10 yuan. So, the group fee per person for x employees would be 800 - 10(x - 25) yuan.

According to the given information, the total fee paid by the organization is 27,000 yuan. 

We can set up the following equation to solve for x:

800x = 27000 if x ≤ 25
800 - 10(x - 25) = 27000 if x > 25

Solving the equation, we can find the value of x, which represents the number of employees who went to Mount Tai.

original_text: 某地为了鼓励居民节约用水，决定实行2级收费制，即每月用水量不超过14吨(含14吨)时，每吨按政府补贴优惠价收费；每月超过14吨时，超过部分每吨按市场调节价收费小英家1月份用水20吨，交水费29元；2月份用水18吨，交水费24元．求每吨水的政府补贴优惠价和市场调节价分别是多少？
new_text:
In order to encourage residents to save water, a certain place has decided to implement a 2-tier charging system. When the monthly water consumption does not exceed 14 tons (including 14 tons), the government will provide a subsidized price per ton. When the monthly consumption exceeds 14 tons, the excess portion will be charged at the market-adjusted price. In January, Xiao Ying's family used 20 tons of water and paid 29 yuan for water. In February, they used 18 tons of water and paid 24 yuan for water. What are the government's subsidized price and the market-adjusted price per ton of water?

To calculate the government's subsidized price and the market-adjusted price per ton of water, we need to find the excess water consumption in each month.

In January, the excess water consumption is 20 tons - 14 tons = 6 tons.
In February, the excess water consumption is 18 tons - 14 tons = 4 tons.

Next, we can calculate the government's subsidized price per ton of water:
Government subsidy = Total water fee - (Excess water consumption * Market-adjusted price)
29 yuan = 20 tons * Government-subsidized price - 6 tons * Market-adjusted price

Similarly, for February:
24 yuan = 18 tons * Government-subsidized price - 4 tons * Market-adjusted price

By solving these two equations, we can find the values of the government's subsidized price and the market-adjusted price per ton of water.

If the store owner sells all these fruits at a discount of 0.8 of the selling price, the profit will be 210 yuan. Find out how many kilograms of apples and grapes were purchased by the fruit store.

original_text: 小明去文具店买铅笔，店主说：“如果多买1些，可以打0.8折”，小明算了1下，如果买50支，比原价可以便宜6元，那么每支铅笔的原价是多少元？
new_text: Little Ming went to the stationery store to buy pencils. The shop owner said, "If you buy a few more, you can get a 20% discount." After calculating, Little Ming found that if he bought 50 pencils, he could save 6 yuan compared to the original price. What is the original price of each pencil?

original_text: 某种商品每件的标价是220元，若按标价的0.9折销售时，仍可获利10%，则这种商品每件的进价为多少元？
new_text: The price of a certain product is 220 yuan per piece. If it is sold at a discount of 0.9 times the marked price and still makes a profit of 10%, what is the cost price of each piece of this product?

original_text: 王强给体育活动小组购买乒乓球拍子，商店经理给出如下优惠条件：如果1次性购买不超过10付，单价为80元，如果1次性购买多于10付，那么每增加2付，购买的所有乒乓球拍子都降低4元，但单价不得低于50元，按此优惠条件，王强1次性购买这种乒乓球拍子付了1200元，问他购买了多少付这种乒乓球拍子？
new_text: Wang Qiang purchased table tennis rackets for the sports activity group. The store manager provided the following discount conditions: If the purchase is not more than 10 sets at once, the unit price is 80 yuan. If the purchase is more than 10 sets at once, for every additional 2 sets, the price of all the table tennis rackets purchased is reduced by 4 yuan, but the unit price cannot be lower than 50 yuan. According to this discount condition, Wang Qiang paid 1200 yuan for the table tennis rackets. How many sets of these table tennis rackets did he purchase?

original_text: 某道路1侧原有路灯106盏，相邻2盏灯的距离为36米，现计划全部更换为新型的节能灯，且相邻2盏灯的距离变为70米，则需更换的新型节能灯有多少盏？
new_text: On one side of a certain road, there are originally 106 streetlights, with a distance of 36 meters between every two adjacent lights. Now, the plan is to replace all of them with a new type of energy-saving lights, and the distance between every two adjacent lights will be changed to 70 meters. How many new energy-saving lights need to be replaced?

original_text: 有长为24m的篱笆，现1面利用墙(墙的最大可用长度a为10m)围成中间隔有1道篱色的长方形花圃，要围成面积为45m^2的花圃，长方形花圃的宽(靠近墙的1遍边)是多长？
new_text: There is a fence with a length of 24m. One side is surrounded by a wall (the maximum usable length of the wall is 10m) to form a rectangular flower bed with one side having a fence. The flower bed needs to have an area of 45m^2. How long is the width of the rectangular flower bed (the side adjacent to the wall)?

original_text: 响水某汽车销售公司9月份销售某厂家的汽车，在1定范围内，每部汽车的进价与销售量有如下关系：若当月仅售出1部汽车，则该部汽车的进价为25万元，每多售出1部，所有售出的汽车的进价均降低0.1万元/部，月底厂家根据销售量1次性返利给销售公司，销售量在10部以内(含10部)，每部返利0.5万元；销售量在10部以上，每部返利1万元．如果汽车的售价为26万元/部，该公司计划当月盈利12万元，那么需要售出多少部汽车？(盈利=销售利润+返利)
new_text: A certain car sales company in Xiangshui sold cars from a certain manufacturer in September. Within a certain range, the cost price of each car is related to the sales volume as follows: if only one car is sold in the month, the cost price of that car is 250,000 yuan. For each additional car sold, the cost price of all sold cars decreases by 10,000 yuan per car. At the end of the month, the manufacturer gives a one-time rebate to the sales company based on the sales volume. If the sales volume is 10 cars or less (including 10 cars), the rebate is 50,000 yuan per car. If the sales volume is more than 10 cars, the rebate is 100,000 yuan per car. If the selling price of the car is 260,000 yuan per car, and the company plans to make a profit of 120,000 yuan in the month, how many cars need to be sold? (Profit = sales profit + rebate)

original_text: 为了美化环境，某市加大了对城市绿化的投资，2012年用于绿化的投资为200万，到2014年用于绿化的投资达到288万，求这2年绿化投资的年平均增长率．
new_text: In order to beautify the environment, a certain city has increased its investment in urban greening. The investment in greening in 2012 was 2 million, and by 2014, the investment in greening reached 2.88 million. Calculate the average annual growth rate of greening investment over these 2 years.

original_text: 1间会议室，它的地面是长方形的，长为40米，宽为30米，现在准备在会议室地面的中间铺1块地毯，要求4周未铺地毯的部分宽度相等，而且地毯的面积是会议室地面面积的1半，则地面上未铺地毯的部分宽度是多少米？
new_text: 1 meeting room, its floor is rectangular, with a length of 40 meters and a width of 30 meters. Now, we are preparing to lay a carpet in the middle of the meeting room floor. It is required that the width of the uncovered part around the carpet is equal on all four sides, and the area of the carpet is half of the meeting room floor area. What is the width of the uncovered part on the floor?

original_text: 王老师利用假期带领部分同学到农村去社会调查，每张车票原价是50元，甲车主说乘我的车每人都可以0.8折优惠；乙车主说乘我的车学生可以0.9折优惠，老师不买票．王老师心里计算了1下，觉得不论坐谁的车，花费都是1样的．请问：王老师1共带了多少学生？
new_text: Teacher Wang led some students to the countryside for a social investigation during the holidays. The original price of each ticket is 50 yuan. Car owner A said that each person can enjoy a 20% discount on my car. Car owner B said that students can enjoy a 10% discount on my car, and the teacher does not need to buy a ticket. Teacher Wang calculated in his mind and felt that no matter whose car he took, the cost would be the same. How many students did Teacher Wang bring in total?

original_text: 某制衣厂计划若干天完成1批服装的订货任务如果每天生产服装33套，那么就比订货任务少生产150套；如果每天生产服装42套，那么就比原计划提前2天完成任务这批服装的订货任务是多少套？
new_text: A certain garment factory plans to complete an order for a batch of clothing in several days. If they produce 33 sets of clothing per day, they will produce 150 sets less than the order. If they produce 42 sets of clothing per day, they will complete the order for this batch of clothing 2 days ahead of the original plan. How many sets of clothing are in this order?

original_text: 王师傅今年6月份开了1家商店，今年8月份开始盈利，9月份盈利2500元，11月份的盈利达到3600元，且从9月到11月，每月盈利的平均增长率都相同．求每月盈利的平均增长率．
new_text: Mr. Wang opened a store in June this year. It started making a profit in August. The profit in September was 2500 yuan, and in November it reached 3600 yuan. Moreover, the average monthly growth rate of profit from September to November is the same. Please calculate the average monthly growth rate of profit.

original_text: 我国古代数学著作《9章算术》中有这样1题，原文是：“今有大器5小器1容3斛，大器1小器五容2斛，问大小器各容几何”意思是：有大小2种盛酒的桶，已知5个大桶加上1个小桶可以盛酒3斛，斛是古代的1种容量单位，1个大桶加上5个小桶可以盛酒2斛1个大桶、1个小桶分别可以盛酒多少斛？请解答．
new_text: In the ancient Chinese mathematical work "Nine Chapters on the Mathematical Art," there is a problem that goes like this: "There are 5 large containers and 1 small container, which together can hold 3 斛 (a unit of capacity). If 1 large container is combined with 5 small containers, they can hold 2 斛. What is the capacity of each large and small container separately?" Please provide the answer.

original_text: 小明在1幅长为80cm，宽为50cm的矩形风景画的4周镶1条相同宽度的金色纸边，制成1幅矩形挂图，如图所示，如果要使整个挂图的面积是5400cm^2，求金色纸边的宽度．

He wants to add a gold paper border of the same width around all four sides to create a rectangular hanging picture, as shown in the diagram. original_text: 在元旦期间，某商场投入13800元资金购进甲、乙2种商品共500件，2种商品的成本价和销售价如下所示:甲的成本价为24元1件，销售价为36元1件；乙的成本价为33元1件，销售价格为48元1件。（1）该商场购进2种商品各多少件？
new_text: During the New Year period, a certain shopping mall invested 13,800 yuan to purchase two types of goods, A and B, totaling 500 pieces. The cost price and selling price of the two types of goods are as follows: The cost price of A is 24 yuan per piece, and the selling price is 36 yuan per piece; the cost price of B is 33 yuan per piece, and the selling price is 48 yuan per piece. (1) How many pieces of each type of goods did the shopping mall purchase?

original_text: 用白铁皮做罐头盒，每张铁皮可制盒身10个或制盒底40个，1个盒身与2个盒底配成1套罐头盒，现有120张白铁皮，用多少张制盒身，多少张制盒底？
new_text: Using tinplate to make tin cans, each sheet of tinplate can be used to make 10 can bodies or 40 can bottoms. 1 can body and 2 can bottoms are used to make 1 set of tin cans. There are currently 120 sheets of tinplate. How many sheets are used to make the can bodies and how many sheets are used to make the can bottoms?

original_text: 某木工厂有22人，1个工人每天可加工3张桌子或10只椅子，1张桌子与4只椅子配套，现要求工人每天做的桌子和椅子完整配套而没有剩余若设安排x个工人加工桌子，y个工人加工椅子，求x和y的值。

Student B made y successful shots and missed x shots, with a total of 18 shots attempted. The table above shows the shooting records of Student A and Student B. We need to find the values of y and x.

original_text: 某市水果批发部门欲将A市的1批水果运往本市销售，有火车和汽车2种运输方式，运输过程中的损耗均为200元/时．其它主要参考数据如下：火车：途中平均速度（千米/时）：100，运费（元/千米）：15，装卸费用（元）：2000；汽车：途中平均速度（千米/时）：80，运费（元/千米）：20，装卸费用（元）900；如果选择汽车的总费用比选择火车费用多1100元，你知道本市与A市之间的路程是多少千米吗？
new_text: A certain city's fruit wholesale department wants to transport a batch of fruit from City A to this city for sale. There are two transportation methods: train and car. The loss during transportation is 200 yuan per hour. Other main reference data are as follows: train: average speed during the journey (kilometers per hour): 100, freight cost (yuan per kilometer): 15, loading and unloading cost (yuan): 2000; car: average speed during the journey (kilometers per hour): 80, freight cost (yuan per kilometer): 20, loading and unloading cost (yuan): 900. If the total cost of choosing a car is 1100 yuan more than choosing a train, do you know how many kilometers are between this city and City A?

original_text: 1个长方形的长比宽的2倍还多1cm，它的宽与另1正方形的边长相等，且这个长方形的面积比正方形的面积多72cm^2．求此长方形的宽．

original_text: 悦读书屋新进1种玩具，按规定会员购买打0.8折，非会员购买打0.9折，同样购买1件玩具，小芳用会员卡购买比小明不用会员卡购买少花2元，则这种玩具原价是多少元？
new_text:
The translation of the Chinese text is as follows:

"Yue Du Bookstore has introduced a new toy. According to the regulations, members can purchase it at a 20% discount, while non-members can purchase it at a 10% discount. If both Xiao Fang and Xiao Ming purchase one toy each, and Xiao Fang, who used a membership card, spent 2 yuan less than Xiao Ming, what is the original price of this toy?"

original_text: 有1批画册，若3人合看1本，则多余2本；若2人合看1本，就有9人没有，有多少人？
new_text: There is a batch of picture albums. If 3 people share 1 book, there will be 2 extra books. If 2 people share 1 book, there will be 9 people without a book. How many people are there?

original_text: 从1块正方形的铁片上剪掉2cm宽的长方形铁片，剩下的面积是48cm^2，则原来铁片的边长是多少？
new_text: "Cutting a rectangular iron piece 2cm wide from a square iron piece, the remaining area is 48cm^2. What is the original side length of the iron piece?"

original_text: 随着市民环保意识的增强，烟花爆竹销售量逐年下降常德市2012年销售烟花爆竹20万箱，到2014年烟花爆竹销售量为9.8万箱求常德市2012年到2014年烟花爆竹年销售量的平均下降率．
new_text: With the enhancement of citizens' environmental awareness, the sales volume of fireworks and firecrackers has been decreasing year by year in Changde City. In 2012, the sales volume of fireworks and firecrackers was 200,000 boxes, and by 2014, it decreased to 98,000 boxes. Calculate the average decline rate of fireworks and firecrackers sales volume from 2012 to 2014 in Changde City.

original_text: 甲、乙两人分别后，沿着铁路反向而行．此时，1列火车匀速地向甲迎面驶来，列车在甲身旁开过，用了15s；然后在乙身旁开过，用了17s．已知2人的步行速度都是3.6km/h．这列火车有多长？
new_text: After A and B separated, they walked in the opposite direction along the railway. At this time, a train was approaching A at a constant speed. The train passed A in 15 seconds, and then passed B in 17 seconds. It is known that the walking speed of both A and B is 3.6 km/h. How long is the train?

original_text: 鸡兔同笼问题是我国古代著名趣题1之大约在1500年前，《孙子算经》中就记载了这个有趣的问题书中是这样叙述的：“今有雉兔同笼，上有35头，下有914足，问雉兔各几何？”这4句话的意思是：有若干只鸡兔同在1个笼子里，从上面数，有35个头；从下面数，有94只脚求笼中各有几只鸡和兔？
new_text: The Chicken and Rabbit in the Same Cage problem is a famous ancient Chinese puzzle. It was recorded in the book "Sunzi's Mathematical Manual" approximately 1500 years ago. The book describes the problem as follows: "There are chickens and rabbits in the same cage. When counted from above, there are 35 heads. When counted from below, there are 94 feet. How many chickens and rabbits are there in the cage?"

original_text: 51期间，某商厦为了促销，将1款每台标价为1635元的空调按标价的0.8折销售，结果仍能盈利9%，则是这款空调机每台的进价为多少元？
new_text: During the 51 period, a certain department store, in order to promote sales, sold a type of air conditioner with a marked price of 1635 yuan per unit at a discount of 20% off the marked price. As a result, they still made a profit of 9%. What was the cost price of each unit of this air conditioner?

original_text: 足球比赛的记分规则是：胜1场得3分，平1场得1分，负1场得0分，若1个队打了14场比赛得17分，其中负了5场，那么这个队胜了多少场？
new_text: The scoring rules for a football match are as follows: winning 1 match earns 3 points, drawing 1 match earns 1 point, losing 1 match earns 0 points. If a team has played 14 matches and earned 17 points, with 5 losses, how many matches did this team win?

original_text: 1条长56cm的铁丝被剪成2段，每段均折成正方形，若2个正方形的面积和等于100cm^2，求这2个正方形的边长．
new_text: A 56cm long iron wire is cut into 2 sections, each section is folded into a square. If the sum of the areas of the two squares is 100cm^2, find the length of the sides of these two squares.

original_text: 某地地震牵动着全国人民的心，某单位开展了“1方有难，8方支援”赈灾捐款活动第一天收到捐款10000元，第三天收到捐款12100元．如果第二天、第三天收到捐款的增长率相同，求捐款增长率？

On the first day, they received a donation of 10,000 yuan, and on the third day, they received a donation of 12,100 yuan. If the donation growth rate on the second and third days is the same, what is the donation growth rate?

original_text: 小红买书需用48元，付款时小红恰好用了1元和5元的纸币共12张，则小红所用的1元和5元纸币各多少张？
new_text: Little Red needs 48 yuan to buy a book. When making the payment, Little Red used a total of 12 banknotes, consisting of 1 yuan and 5 yuan bills. How many 1 yuan and 5 yuan bills did Little Red use?

original_text: 10年后，某班学生聚会，见面时相互间均握了1次手，1共握了780次．你认为这次参加聚会的同学有多少人？
new_text: After 10 years, a class of students had a reunion. When they met, they shook hands with each other once, resulting in a total of 780 handshakes. How many classmates do you think attended the reunion?

original_text: 某水果批发市场香蕉的价格如下:购买香蕉数不超过20千克，每千克价格6元；购买香蕉数20千克以上但不超过40千克的，每千克价格5元；购买香蕉数40千克以上的，每千克价格4元．张强2次共购买香蕉50kg(二一)第次多于第次，共付出264元，请问张强第一次，第二次分别购买香蕉多少千克？
new_text: The price of bananas in a certain fruit wholesale market is as follows: If the quantity of bananas purchased does not exceed 20 kilograms, the price is 6 yuan per kilogram; if the quantity of bananas purchased is above 20 kilograms but does not exceed 40 kilograms, the price is 5 yuan per kilogram; if the quantity of bananas purchased is above 40 kilograms, the price is 4 yuan per kilogram. Zhang Qiang purchased bananas twice, totaling 50 kilograms. The second purchase was more than the first purchase, and a total of 264 yuan was paid. May I ask how many kilograms of bananas Zhang Qiang purchased in the first and second purchases respectively?

original_text: 为奖励表现优秀的学生，某校准备购买1批文具袋和圆规作为奖品，已知购买1个文具袋和2个圆规需21元；购买2个文具袋和3个圆规需39元．求文具袋和圆规的单价．
new_text: To reward outstanding students, a certain school is preparing to purchase a batch of pencil cases and compasses as prizes. It is known that the cost of purchasing 1 pencil case and 2 compasses is 21 yuan, and the cost of purchasing 2 pencil cases and 3 compasses is 39 yuan. original_text: 李明同学利用暑假外出旅游1周，已知这1周各天的日期之和是126，那么李斌同学回家的日期是多少号？

original_text: 我市某超市举行店庆活动，对甲、乙2种商品实行打折销售打折前，购买3件甲商品和1件乙商品需用190元；购买2件甲商品和3件乙商品需用220元问甲乙商品单价分别为多少？
new_text: A supermarket in our city is holding a store celebration event. Two types of products, A and B, are being sold at a discounted price. Before the discount, purchasing 3 items of product A and 1 item of product B costs 190 yuan. Purchasing 2 items of product A and 3 items of product B costs 220 yuan. What are the unit prices of products A and B, respectively?

original_text: 《中华人民共和国个人所得税法》规定，公民全月工资、薪金所得不超过2000元的部分不必纳税，超过2000元的部分为全月应纳税所得额．此项税款按下表分段累进计算：某人1月份应交纳此项税款26.78元，则他的当月工资、薪金所得是多少？（全月应纳税所得额：不超过500元的部分：税率：5%；超过500至2000元部分：税率：10%；超过2000元至5000元部分:税率：15%……）
new_text: "The Personal Income Tax Law of the People's Republic of China stipulates that the portion of a citizen's monthly salary and wage income that does not exceed 2000 yuan is not subject to taxation. The portion that exceeds 2000 yuan is the taxable income for the month. According to the regulations in 1999, the 'monthly taxable income' in the table refers to the balance after deducting 800 yuan from the income. For example, if someone's monthly income is 1020 yuan, deducting 800 yuan, the taxable income is 220 yuan, and the individual income tax to be paid is 11 yuan. original_text: 《孙子算经》是唐初作为“算学”教科书的著名的《算经十书》1之，共3卷，上卷叙述算筹记数的制度和乘除法则，中卷举例说明筹算分数法和开平方法，都是了解中国古代筹算的重要资料．下卷收集了1些算术难题，“鸡兔同笼”问题是其中1之．原题如下：今有雉（鸡）兔同笼，上有35头，下有914足．问鸡、兔各几何？请用方程知识求出鸡有多少只？
new_text: "The Art of Calculation by Sunzi" is one of the famous "Ten Books on Calculation" that served as a textbook for "mathematics" during the Tang Dynasty. It consists of three volumes. The first volume describes the system of calculation using counting rods and the rules of multiplication and division. The second volume provides examples of fraction calculation and the method of square root extraction. These are important materials for understanding ancient Chinese calculation methods. The third volume collects some arithmetic problems, including the famous "chicken and rabbit in the same cage" problem. The original problem is as follows: There are chickens and rabbits in the same cage, with a total of 35 heads and 914 feet. The question is how many chickens are there? Please use equation knowledge to find out the number of chickens.

original_text: 某超市出售A，B2种商品，买6件A商品和3件B商品共需要54元．买3样A商品和4件B商品共需要32元。A，B2种商品的售价分别是多少元？

original_text: 要建1个面积为300m^2的长方形围栏，围栏总长50m，1边靠墙(墙长25m)．求围栏的宽(垂直于墙的1边)

original_text: 甲、乙2地相距217.5km，1列快车和1列慢车分别从甲、乙2地出发，相向而行．已知慢车每小时行35km，快车每小时行65km，如果慢车先开0.5h，问慢车开出后几小时2车相遇？

original_text: 2013年，无锡市蠡湖新城某楼盘以每平方米12000元的均价对外销售．由于楼盘滞销，房地产商为了加快资金周转，决定进行降价促销，经过连续2年下调后，2015年该楼盘的均价为每平方米9720元．求平均每年下调的100分率；
new_text: In 2013, a real estate development in Li Lake New Town, Wuxi City, was sold to the public at an average price of 12,000 yuan per square meter. Due to slow sales, the real estate developer decided to lower the price to speed up capital turnover. original_text: 2014年11月11日，阿里巴巴销售额达到571亿，比上一年同日增长63.1%．其中京东商城推出1款大衣，标价1000元，平常1律0.9折出售，但“211”当天该款大衣打65折后再享受3项优惠“满300元减30元，满600元减70元，满1000元减150元”活动中的1项（每人限购1件）．211当天该款大衣共销售了50件．由于促销力度大，211当天该款大衣所获利润相当于此款大衣平时卖10件的利润，从11月12日开始，该款大衣打65折后不再享受其他优惠活动．问从11月12日开始计算，若商家想获得25000元利润，需销售该衣服多少件？
new_text: On November 11, 2014, Alibaba's sales reached 57.1 billion yuan, an increase of 63.1% compared to the same day of the previous year. Among them, Jingdong Mall launched a coat with a price tag of 1000 yuan, usually sold at a discount of 10% off, but on "211" day, this coat was discounted by 35% and also enjoyed 3 additional discounts: "30 yuan off for every 300 yuan spent, 70 yuan off for every 600 yuan spent, and 150 yuan off for every 1000 yuan spent" (limited to 1 item per person). On "211" day, a total of 50 pieces of this coat were sold. Due to the strong promotion, the profit from selling this coat on "211" day was equivalent to the profit from selling 10 coats on a regular day. Starting from November 12, this coat will no longer enjoy other promotional activities after being discounted by 35%. If the merchant wants to make a profit of 25,000 yuan starting from November 12, how many pieces of this coat need to be sold?

original_text: 某超市开展促销活动，1次性购物满200元后将给购物者优惠，购物超过200元不足500元的，按0.9折优惠；购物超过500元的，购物超过500元的，500元以下（含500元）仍按0.9折优惠，而超过500元的部分按0.8折优惠，某人第一次和第二次购物分别用了134元和490元，问：此人购物时，所付金额为490的物品的原价是多少？

For purchases exceeding 200 yuan but less than 500 yuan, there will be a 10% discount. For purchases exceeding 500 yuan, the portion exceeding 500 yuan will be discounted at 20%, while the portion below or equal to 500 yuan will still receive a 10% discount.
